dadau tām samalaṃkṛtya svasāram kaurava ṛṣabhe

original: 01,105.007d@061_0040 sa tāṃ mādrīm upādāya bhīṣmaḥ sāgaragāsutaḥ
analyzed: sa tām mādrīm upādāya bhīṣmaḥ sāgaragā sutaḥ
ājagāma puram dhīmān praviṣṭaḥ gajasāhvayam
tatas iṣṭe hani prāpte muhūrte sādhu saṃmate

original: 01,105.007d@061_0043 jagrāha vidhivat pāṇiṃ mādryāḥ pāṇḍur narādhipaḥ
analyzed: jagrāha vidhivat pāṇim mādryāḥ pāṇḍuḥ narādhipaḥ

original: 01,105.007d@061_0044 tato vivāhe nirvṛtte sa rājā kurunandanaḥ
analyzed: tatas vivāhe nirvṛtte sa rājā kuru nandanaḥ

original: 01,105.007d@061_0045 sthāpayām āsa tāṃ bhāryāṃ śubhe veśmani bhāvinīm
analyzed: sthāpayām āsa tām bhāryām śubhe veśmani bhāvinīm

original: 01,105.007d@061_0046 sa tābhyāṃ vyacarat sārdhaṃ bhāryābhyāṃ rājasattamaḥ
analyzed: sa tābhyām vyacarat sārdham bhāryābhyām rāja sattamaḥ

original: 01,105.007d@061_0047 kuntyā mādryā ca rājendro yathākāmaṃ yathāsukham
analyzed: kuntyā mādryā ca rāja indraḥ yathākāmam yathāsukham

original: 01,105.007d@061_0048 tataḥ sa kauravo rājā vihṛtya tridaśā niśāḥ
analyzed: tatas sa kauravaḥ rājā vihṛtya tridaśāḥ niśāḥ

original: 01,105.007d@061_0049 jigīṣayā mahīṃ pāṇḍur niścakrāma purāt prabho
analyzed: jigīṣayā mahīm pāṇḍuḥ niścakrāma purāt prabho

original: 01,105.007d@061_0050 sa bhīṣmapramukhān vṛddhān abhivādya praṇamya ca
analyzed: sa bhīṣma pramukhān vṛddhān abhivādya praṇamya ca
dhṛtarāṣṭram ca kauravyam tathā anyān kuru sattamān
āmantrya prayayau rājā taiḥ ca eva abhyanumoditaḥ
maṅgalācāra yuktābhiḥ āśīrbhiḥ ca abhinanditaḥ
gaja vāji ratha oghena balena mahatā agamat
sa rājā devarāja ābhaḥ vijigīṣuḥ vasuṃdharām
hṛṣṭa puṣṭa balaḥ prāyāt pāṇḍuḥ śatrūn anekaśas

original: 01,105.008a pūrvam āgaskṛto gatvā daśārṇāḥ samare jitāḥ
analyzed: pūrvam āgaskṛtaḥ gatvā daśārṇāḥ samare jitāḥ
pāṇḍunā nara siṃhena kauravāṇām yaśaḥ bhṛtā
tatas senām upādāya pāṇḍuḥ nānāvidha dhvajām
prabhūta hasti aśva rathām padāti gaṇa saṃkulām
āgaskṛt sarva vīrāṇām vairī sarva mahībhṛtām
goptā magadha rāṣṭrasya dārvaḥ rājagṛhe hataḥ

original: 01,105.011a tataḥ kośaṃ samādāya vāhanāni balāni ca
analyzed: tatas kośam samādāya vāhanāni balāni ca

original: 01,105.011c pāṇḍunā mithilāṃ gatvā videhāḥ samare jitāḥ
analyzed: pāṇḍunā mithilām gatvā videhāḥ samare jitāḥ
tathā kāśiṣu suhmeṣu puṇḍreṣu bharata ṛṣabha
sva bāhu bala vīryeṇa kurūṇām akarot yaśaḥ
tam śara ogha mahā jvālam ariṃdamam
pāṇḍu pāvakam āsādya vyadahyanta narādhipāḥ
te sa senāḥ sa senena vidhvaṃsita balāḥ nṛpāḥ
pāṇḍunā vaśa gāḥ kṛtvā kara karmasu yojitāḥ

original: 01,105.015a tena te nirjitāḥ sarve pṛthivyāṃ sarvapārthivāḥ
analyzed: tena te nirjitāḥ sarve pṛthivyām sarva pārthivāḥ

original: 01,105.015c tam ekaṃ menire śūraṃ deveṣv iva puraṃdaram
analyzed: tam ekam menire śūram deveṣu iva puraṃdaram
tam kṛtāñjalayaḥ sarve praṇatāḥ vasudhādhipāḥ

original: 01,105.016c upājagmur dhanaṃ gṛhya ratnāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: upājagmuḥ dhanam gṛhya ratnāni vividhāni ca
maṇi muktā pravālam ca suvarṇam rajatam tathā
go ratnāni aśva ratnāni ratha ratnāni kuñjarān

original: 01,105.018a kharoṣṭramahiṣāṃś caiva yac ca kiṃ cid ajāvikam
analyzed: khara uṣṭra mahiṣān ca eva yat ca kim cit ajāvikam
tat sarvam pratijagrāha rājā nāgapura adhipaḥ

original: 01,105.019a tad ādāya yayau pāṇḍuḥ punar muditavāhanaḥ
analyzed: tat ādāya yayau pāṇḍuḥ punar mudita vāhanaḥ
harṣayiṣyan sva rāṣṭrāṇi puram ca gajasāhvayam
śaṃtanoḥ rāja siṃhasya bharatasya ca dhīmataḥ

original: 01,105.020c pranaṣṭaḥ kīrtijaḥ śabdaḥ pāṇḍunā punar uddhṛtaḥ
analyzed: pranaṣṭaḥ kīrti jaḥ śabdaḥ pāṇḍunā punar uddhṛtaḥ

original: 01,105.021a ye purā kururāṣṭrāṇi jahruḥ kurudhanāni ca
analyzed: ye purā kuru rāṣṭrāṇi jahruḥ kuru dhanāni ca
te nāgapura siṃhena pāṇḍunā kara dāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: 01,105.022a ity abhāṣanta rājāno rājāmātyāś ca saṃgatāḥ
analyzed: iti abhāṣanta rājānaḥ rāja amātyāḥ ca saṃgatāḥ
abhyanandanta vai pāṇḍum āśīrvādaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ
pratīta manasaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ paura jānapadaiḥ saha
pratyudyayuḥ tam saṃprāptam sarve bhīṣma purogamāḥ
te na dūram iva adhvānam gatvā nāgapura ālayāḥ

original: 01,105.023e āvṛtaṃ dadṛśur lokaṃ hṛṣṭā bahuvidhair janaiḥ
analyzed: āvṛtam dadṛśuḥ lokam hṛṣṭāḥ bahuvidhaiḥ janaiḥ
nānā yāna samānītaiḥ ratnaiḥ uccāvacaiḥ tathā
hasti aśva ratha ratnaiḥ ca gobhiḥ uṣṭraiḥ atha avikaiḥ

original: 01,105.024e nāntaṃ dadṛśur āsādya bhīṣmeṇa saha kauravāḥ
analyzed: na antam dadṛśuḥ āsādya bhīṣmeṇa saha kauravāḥ
saḥ bhivādya pituḥ pādau kausalyā ānanda vardhanaḥ
yathārham mānayām āsa paura jānapadān api
pramṛdya para rāṣṭrāṇi kṛtārtham punar āgatam

original: 01,105.026c putram āsādya bhīṣmas tu harṣād aśrūṇy avartayat
analyzed: putram āsādya bhīṣmaḥ tu harṣāt aśrūṇi avartayat
sa tūrya śata saṃghānām bherīṇām ca mahā svanaiḥ
harṣayan sarvaśas paurān viveśa gajasāhvayam
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
dhṛtarāṣṭra abhyanujñātaḥ sva bāhu vijitam dhanam

original: 01,106.001c bhīṣmāya satyavatyai ca mātre copajahāra saḥ
analyzed: bhīṣmāya satyavatyai ca mātre ca upajahāra saḥ

original: 01,106.002a vidurāya ca vai pāṇḍuḥ preṣayām āsa tad dhanam
analyzed: vidurāya ca vai pāṇḍuḥ preṣayām āsa tat dhanam
suhṛdaḥ ca api dharma ātmā dhanena samatarpayat

original: 01,106.003a tataḥ satyavatīṃ bhīṣmaḥ kausalyāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
analyzed: tatas satyavatīm bhīṣmaḥ kausalyām ca yaśasvinīm

original: 01,106.003c śubhaiḥ pāṇḍujitai ratnais toṣayām āsa bhārata
analyzed: śubhaiḥ ratnaiḥ toṣayām āsa bhārata
nananda mātā kausalyā tam apratima tejasam
jayantam iva paulomī pariṣvajya nara ṛṣabham
tasya vīrasya vikrāntaiḥ sahasra śata dakṣiṇaiḥ
asaṃkhyeyaiḥ dhanaiḥ rājā
aśvamedha śataiḥ īje dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ mahā makhaiḥ

original: 01,106.006a saṃprayuktaś ca kuntyā ca mādryā ca bharatarṣabha
analyzed: saṃprayuktaḥ ca kuntyā ca mādryā ca bharata ṛṣabha
jita tandrīḥ tadā pāṇḍuḥ babhūva vana gocaraḥ
hitvā prāsāda nilayam śubhāni śayanāni ca
araṇya nityaḥ satatam babhūva mṛgayā paraḥ

original: 01,106.008a sa caran dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ ramyaṃ himavato gireḥ
analyzed: sa caran dakṣiṇam pārśvam ramyam himavataḥ gireḥ
uvāsa giri pṛṣṭheṣu mahā śāla vaneṣu ca

original: 01,106.009a rarāja kuntyā mādryā ca pāṇḍuḥ saha vane vasan
analyzed: rarāja kuntyā mādryā ca pāṇḍuḥ saha vane vasan

original: 01,106.009c kareṇvor iva madhyasthaḥ śrīmān pauraṃdaro gajaḥ
analyzed: kareṇvoḥ iva madhya sthaḥ śrīmān pauraṃdaraḥ gajaḥ
bhāratam saha bhāryābhyām bāṇa khaḍga dhanuḥ dharam
vicitra kavacam vīram parama astra vidam nṛpam
devaḥ yam iti amanyanta carantam vana vāsinaḥ

original: 01,106.011a tasya kāmāṃś ca bhogāṃś ca narā nityam atandritāḥ
analyzed: tasya kāmān ca bhogān ca narāḥ nityam atandritāḥ
upajahruḥ vanānteṣu dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa coditāḥ
atha pāraśavīm kanyām devakasya mahīpateḥ
rūpa yauvana saṃpannām sa śuśrāva āpagāsutaḥ

original: 01,106.013a tatas tu varayitvā tām ānāyya puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu varayitvā tām ānāyya puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ
vivāham kārayām āsa vidurasya mahāmateḥ
tasyām ca utpādayām āsa viduraḥ kuru nandanaḥ
putrān vinaya saṃpannān ātmanaḥ sadṛśān guṇaiḥ
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
tatas putra śatam jajñe gāndhāryām janamejaya

original: 01,107.001c dhṛtarāṣṭrasya vaiśyāyām ekaś cāpi śatāt paraḥ
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya vaiśyāyām ekaḥ ca api śatāt paraḥ

original: 01,107.002a pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāṃ ca mādryāṃ ca pañca putrā mahārathāḥ
analyzed: pāṇḍoḥ kuntyām ca mādryām ca pañca putrāḥ mahā rathāḥ
devebhyaḥ samapadyanta saṃtānāya kulasya vai
janamejayaḥ uvāca
katham putra śatam jajñe gāndhāryām dvijasattama

original: 01,107.003c kiyatā caiva kālena teṣām āyuś ca kiṃ param
analyzed: kiyatā ca eva kālena teṣām āyuḥ ca kim param
katham ca ekaḥ sa vaiśyāyām dhṛtarāṣṭra sutaḥ bhavat

original: 01,107.004c kathaṃ ca sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ gāndhārīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
analyzed: katham ca sadṛśīm bhāryām gāndhārīm dharma cāriṇīm
ānukūlye vartamānām dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ tyavartata

original: 01,107.005a kathaṃ ca śaptasya sataḥ pāṇḍos tena mahātmanā
analyzed: katham ca śaptasya sataḥ pāṇḍoḥ tena mahātmanā
samutpannāḥ daivatebhyaḥ pañca putrāḥ mahā rathāḥ
etat vidvan yathāvṛttam vistareṇa tapodhana

original: 01,107.006c kathayasva na me tṛptiḥ kathyamāneṣu bandhuṣu
analyzed: kathayasva na me tṛptiḥ kathyamāneṣu bandhuṣu
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
kṣudh śrama abhipariglānam dvaipāyanam upasthitam

original: 01,107.007c toṣayām āsa gāndhārī vyāsas tasyai varaṃ dadau
analyzed: toṣayām āsa gāndhārī vyāsaḥ tasyai varam dadau

original: 01,107.008a sā vavre sadṛśaṃ bhartuḥ putrāṇāṃ śatam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: sā vavre sadṛśam bhartuḥ putrāṇām śatam ātmanaḥ

original: 01,107.008c tataḥ kālena sā garbhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrād athāgrahīt
analyzed: tatas kālena sā garbham dhṛtarāṣṭrāt atha agrahīt
gāndhāryām āhite garbhe pāṇḍuḥ ambālikā sutaḥ
agacchat paramam duḥkham apatya artham ariṃdama
garbhiṇyām atha gāndhāryām pāṇḍuḥ parama duḥkhitaḥ
mṛga abhiśāpāt ātmānam śocan uparata kriyaḥ

original: 01,107.008d*1135_05 sa gatvā tapasā siddhiṃ viśvāmitro yathā bhuvi
analyzed: sa gatvā tapasā siddhim viśvāmitraḥ yathā bhuvi
deha nyāse kṛta manāḥ idam vacanam abravīt

original: 01,107.009a saṃvatsaradvayaṃ taṃ tu gāndhārī garbham āhitam
analyzed: saṃvatsara dvayam tam tu gāndhārī garbham āhitam

original: 01,107.009c aprajā dhārayām āsa tatas tāṃ duḥkham āviśat
analyzed: aprajāḥ dhārayām āsa tatas tām duḥkham āviśat
śrutvā kuntī sutam jātam bāla arka sama tejasam
udarasya ātmanaḥ sthairyam upalabhya anvacintayat
ajñātam dhṛtarāṣṭrasya yatnena mahatā tatas
sodaram pātayām āsa gāndhārī duḥkha mūrcchitā
tatas jajñe māṃsa peśī loha aṣṭhīlā iva saṃhatā
dvi varṣa saṃbhṛtām kukṣau tām utsraṣṭum pracakrame
atha dvaipāyanaḥ jñātvā tvaritaḥ samupāgamat

original: 01,107.013c tāṃ sa māṃsamayīṃ peśīṃ dadarśa japatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tām sa māṃsa mayīm peśīm dadarśa japatām varaḥ

original: 01,107.014a tato 'bravīt saubaleyīṃ kim idaṃ te cikīrṣitam
analyzed: tatas bravīt saubaleyīm kim idam te cikīrṣitam

original: 01,107.014c sā cātmano mataṃ satyaṃ śaśaṃsa paramarṣaye
analyzed: sā ca ātmanaḥ matam satyam śaśaṃsa parama ṛṣaye
jyeṣṭham kuntī sutam jātam śrutvā ravi sama prabham
duḥkhena parameṇa idam udaram pātitam mayā

original: 01,107.016a śataṃ ca kila putrāṇāṃ vitīrṇaṃ me tvayā purā
analyzed: śatam ca kila putrāṇām vitīrṇam me tvayā purā

original: 01,107.016c iyaṃ ca me māṃsapeśī jātā putraśatāya vai
analyzed: iyam ca me māṃsa peśī jātā putra śatāya vai
vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: 01,107.017a evam etat saubaleyi naitaj jātv anyathā bhavet
analyzed: evam etat saubaleyi na etat jātu anyathā bhavet

original: 01,107.017c vitathaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me svaireṣv api kuto 'nyathā
analyzed: vitatham na ukta pūrvam me svaireṣu api kutas nyathā
ghṛta pūrṇam kuṇḍa śatam kṣipram eva vidhīyatām
svanugupteṣu deśeṣu rakṣā ca eva vidhīyatām

original: 01,107.018c śītābhir adbhir aṣṭhīlām imāṃ ca pariṣiñcata
analyzed: śītābhiḥ adbhiḥ aṣṭhīlām imām ca pariṣiñcata
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,107.019a sā sicyamānā aṣṭhīlā abhavac chatadhā tadā
analyzed: sā sicyamānā aṣṭhīlā abhavat śatadhā tadā
aṅguṣṭha parva mātrāṇām garbhāṇām pṛthak eva tu
eka adhika śatam pūrṇam yathāyogam viśām pate

original: 01,107.020b*1137_01 tataḥ kuṇḍaśataṃ tatra ānāyya tu mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: tatas kuṇḍa śatam tatra ānāyya tu mahān ṛṣiḥ
māṃsa peśyāḥ tadā rājan kramaśas kāla paryayāt

original: 01,107.021a tatas tāṃs teṣu kuṇḍeṣu garbhān avadadhe tadā
analyzed: tatas tān teṣu kuṇḍeṣu garbhān avadadhe tadā

original: 01,107.021c svanugupteṣu deśeṣu rakṣāṃ ca vyadadhāt tataḥ
analyzed: svanugupteṣu deśeṣu rakṣām ca vyadadhāt tatas

original: 01,107.021d*1138_01 śaśāsa caiva kṛṣṇo vai garbhāṇāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tadā
analyzed: śaśāsa ca eva kṛṣṇaḥ vai garbhāṇām rakṣaṇam tadā
śaśāsa ca eva bhagavān kālena etāvatā punar
vighaṭṭanīyāni etāni kuṇḍāni iti sma saubalīm

original: 01,107.022d*1139_01 ahnottarā kumārās te kuṇḍebhyas tu samutthitāḥ
analyzed: ahnā uttarā kumārāḥ te kuṇḍebhyaḥ tu samutthitāḥ

original: 01,107.023a ity uktvā bhagavān vyāsas tathā pratividhāya ca
analyzed: iti uktvā bhagavān vyāsaḥ tathā pratividhāya ca
jagāma tapase dhīmān himavantam śiloccayam
evam saṃdiśya kauravya kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ tadā
jagāma parvatāya eva tapase saṃśita vrataḥ

original: 01,107.024a jajñe krameṇa caitena teṣāṃ duryodhano nṛpaḥ
analyzed: jajñe krameṇa ca etena teṣām duryodhanaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 01,107.024c janmatas tu pramāṇena jyeṣṭho rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: janmataḥ tu pramāṇena jyeṣṭhaḥ rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 01,107.024d*1141_01 tadākhyātaṃ tu bhīṣmāya vidurāya ca dhīmate
analyzed: tat ākhyātam tu bhīṣmāya vidurāya ca dhīmate

original: 01,107.024d*1142_01 yasminn ahani durdharṣo jajñe duryodhanas tadā
analyzed: yasmin ahani durdharṣaḥ jajñe duryodhanaḥ tadā

original: 01,107.024d*1142_02 tasminn eva mahābāhur jajñe bhīmo 'pi vīryavān
analyzed: tasmin eva mahā bāhuḥ jajñe vīryavān
sa jāta mātraḥ eva atha dhṛtarāṣṭra sutaḥ nṛpa
rāsabha ārāva sadṛśam rurāva ca nanāda ca
tam kharāḥ pratyabhāṣanta gṛdhra gomāyu vāyasāḥ

original: 01,107.024d*1142_06 vātāś ca pravavuś cāpi digdāhaś cābhavat tadā
analyzed: vātāḥ ca pravavuḥ ca api digdāhaḥ ca abhavat tadā
jāta mātre sute tasmin dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ bravīt idam
duryodhane jāta mātre dikṣu sarvāsu bhārata
kravyādāḥ prāṇadan ghorāḥ śivāḥ ca aśiva nisvanāḥ

original: 01,107.025b*1143_03 vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo bhayam āvedayan mahat
analyzed: vavarṣa rudhiram devaḥ bhayam āvedayat mahat
etasmin antare rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ mbikāsutaḥ

original: 01,107.025c samānīya bahūn viprān bhīṣmaṃ viduram eva ca
analyzed: samānīya bahūn viprān bhīṣmam viduram eva ca

original: 01,107.025d*1144_01 anyāṃś ca suhṛdo rājan kurūn sarvāṃs tathaiva ca
analyzed: anyān ca suhṛdaḥ rājan kurūn sarvān tathā eva ca
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rāja putraḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ naḥ kula vardhanaḥ

original: 01,107.026c prāptaḥ svaguṇato rājyaṃ na tasmin vācyam asti naḥ
analyzed: prāptaḥ sva guṇataḥ rājyam na tasmin vācyam asti naḥ

original: 01,107.027a ayaṃ tv anantaras tasmād api rājā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: ayam tu anantaraḥ tasmāt api rājā bhaviṣyati

rakṣaṇe vismṛtā kuntī vyagrā brāhmaṇa bhojane

tasmin kāle samāhūya mādrīm madana mohitaḥ
bhūtasaṃmohane rājā sa bhāryaḥ vyacarat vanam
palāśaiḥ tilakaiḥ cūtaiḥ campakaiḥ pāribhadrakaiḥ

karṇikāraiḥ aśokaiḥ ca keśaraiḥ atimuktakaiḥ

cūtaiḥ mañjiribhiḥ ca eva pārijāta vanaiḥ api
parapuṣṭa upasaṃghuṣṭa saṃgītaiḥ ṣaṭpadaiḥ api

original: 01,119.043d@073_0079 evam astv iti taṃ nāgaṃ vāsukiḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: 01,119.043d@073_0080 tato bhīmas tadā nāgaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ śuciḥ

original: 01,119.043d@073_0128 duryodhano 'pi taṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavaṃ punar āgatam
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ pi tam dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavam punar āgatam

original: 01,120.004c tathā sa tapasopetaḥ sarvāṇy astrāṇy avāpa ha

loke pratima saṃsthānām utphulla nayanaḥ bhavat

original: 01,120.009a dhanuś ca hi śarāś cāsya karābhyāṃ prāpatan bhuvi
analyzed: dhanuḥ ca hi śarāḥ ca asya karābhyām prāpatan bhuvi

original: 01,120.009c vepathuś cāsya tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śarīre samajāyata

original: 01,120.014a mṛgayāṃ carato rājñaḥ śaṃtanos tu yadṛcchayā

original: 01,120.018c tasmāt tayor nāma cakre tad eva sa mahīpatiḥ

analyzed: nikhilena asya tat sarvam guhyam ākhyātavān tadā

vṛṣṇayaḥ ca nṛpāḥ ca anye nānā deśa samāgatāḥ
kṛpam ācāryam āsādya parama astra jña tām gatāḥ
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
viśeṣa arthī tatas bhīṣmaḥ pautrāṇām vinaya īpsayā
iṣu astra jñān paryapṛcchat ācāryān vīrya saṃmatān
na alpa dhīḥ na a mahābhāgaḥ tathā nānā astra kovidaḥ
na adeva sattvaḥ vinayet kurūn astre mahā balān
iti saṃcintya gāṅgeyaḥ tadā bharata sattamaḥ

vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,121.002d*1331_05 gaṅgādvāraṃ prati mahān babhūva bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

analyzed: tatas sya retaḥ caskanda tat ṛṣiḥ droṇe ādadhe

original: 01,121.004d*1334_01 vyapakṛṣṭāmbarāṃ dṛṣṭvā tām ṛṣiś cakame tataḥ

original: 01,121.005d*1336_01 agner astram upādāya yad ṛṣir veda kāśyapaḥ
analyzed: agneḥ astram upādāya yat ṛṣiḥ veda kāśyapaḥ

original: 01,123.047a śīghraṃ bhavantaḥ sarve vai dhanūṃṣy ādāya satvarāḥ
analyzed: śīghram bhavantaḥ sarve vai dhanūṃṣi ādāya sa tvarāḥ
bhāsam etam samuddiśya tiṣṭhantām saṃhita iṣavaḥ
mad vākya sama kālam ca śiraḥ sya vinipātyatām
ekaikaśas niyokṣyāmi tathā kuruta putrakāḥ
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
tatas yudhiṣṭhiram pūrvam uvāca aṅgirasām varaḥ

original: 01,123.049c saṃdhatsva bāṇaṃ durdharṣa madvākyānte vimuñca ca
analyzed: saṃdhatsva bāṇam durdharṣa mad vākya ante vimuñca ca

original: 01,123.050a tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ pūrvaṃ dhanur gṛhya mahāravam
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ pūrvam dhanuḥ gṛhya mahā ravam
tasthau bhāsam samuddiśya guru vākya pracoditaḥ
tatas vitata dhanvānam droṇaḥ tam kuru nandanam
sa muhūrtāt uvāca idam vacanam bharata ṛṣabha
paśyasi enam druma agra stham bhāsam nara vara ātmaja
paśyāmi iti evam ācāryam pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 01,123.053a sa muhūrtād iva punar droṇas taṃ pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: sa muhūrtāt iva punar droṇaḥ tam pratyabhāṣata

original: 01,123.053c atha vṛkṣam imaṃ māṃ vā bhrātṝn vāpi prapaśyasi
analyzed: atha vṛkṣam imam mām vā bhrātṝn vā api prapaśyasi

original: 01,123.054a tam uvāca sa kaunteyaḥ paśyāmy enaṃ vanaspatim
analyzed: tam uvāca sa kaunteyaḥ paśyāmi enam vanaspatim

original: 01,123.054c bhavantaṃ ca tathā bhrātṝn bhāsaṃ ceti punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: bhavantam ca tathā bhrātṝn bhāsam ca iti punar punar
tam uvāca apasarpa iti droṇo prīta manāḥ iva

original: 01,123.055c naitac chakyaṃ tvayā veddhuṃ lakṣyam ity eva kutsayan
analyzed: na etat śakyam tvayā veddhum lakṣyam iti eva kutsayan
tatas duryodhana ādīn tān dhārtarāṣṭrān mahā yaśāḥ
tena eva krama yogena jijñāsuḥ paryapṛcchata

original: 01,123.057a anyāṃś ca śiṣyān bhīmādīn rājñaś caivānyadeśajān
analyzed: anyān ca śiṣyān bhīma ādīn rājñaḥ ca eva anya deśajān

original: 01,123.057c tathā ca sarve sarvaṃ tat paśyāma iti kutsitāḥ
analyzed: tathā ca sarve sarvam tat paśyāmaḥ iti kutsitāḥ
tatas dhanaṃjayam droṇaḥ smayamānaḥ bhyabhāṣata
tvayā idānīm prahartavyam etat lakṣyam niśamyatām
mad vākya sama kālam te bhavet śaraḥ

original: 01,123.059c vitatya kārmukaṃ putra tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtakam
analyzed: vitatya kārmukam putra tiṣṭha tāvat muhūrtakam
evam uktaḥ savyasācī maṇḍalīkṛta kārmukaḥ
tasthau lakṣyam samuddiśya guru vākya pracoditaḥ

original: 01,123.061a muhūrtād iva taṃ droṇas tathaiva samabhāṣata
analyzed: muhūrtāt iva tam droṇaḥ tathā eva samabhāṣata

original: 01,123.061c paśyasy enaṃ sthitaṃ bhāsaṃ drumaṃ mām api vety uta
analyzed: paśyasi enam sthitam bhāsam drumam mām api vā iti uta

original: 01,123.062a paśyāmy enaṃ bhāsam iti droṇaṃ pārtho 'bhyabhāṣata
analyzed: paśyāmi enam bhāsam iti droṇam pārthaḥ bhyabhāṣata

original: 01,123.062c na tu vṛkṣaṃ bhavantaṃ vā paśyāmīti ca bhārata
analyzed: na tu vṛkṣam bhavantam vā paśyāmi iti ca bhārata

original: 01,123.063a tataḥ prītamanā droṇo muhūrtād iva taṃ punaḥ
analyzed: tatas prīta manāḥ droṇaḥ muhūrtāt iva tam punar
pratyabhāṣata durdharṣaḥ pāṇḍavānām ratha ṛṣabham

original: 01,123.064a bhāsaṃ paśyasi yady enaṃ tathā brūhi punar vacaḥ
analyzed: bhāsam paśyasi yadi enam tathā brūhi punar vacaḥ

original: 01,123.064c śiraḥ paśyāmi bhāsasya na gātram iti so 'bravīt
analyzed: śiraḥ paśyāmi bhāsasya na gātram iti saḥ bravīt
arjunena evam uktaḥ tu droṇaḥ hṛṣṭa tanūruhaḥ
muñcasva iti abravīt pārtham sa mumoca avicārayan

original: 01,123.066a tatas tasya nagasthasya kṣureṇa niśitena ha
analyzed: tatas tasya naga sthasya kṣureṇa niśitena ha

original: 01,123.066c śira utkṛtya tarasā pātayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: śiraḥ utkṛtya tarasā pātayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
tasmin karmaṇi saṃsiddhe phalgunam

original: 01,123.067c mene ca drupadaṃ saṃkhye sānubandhaṃ parājitam
analyzed: mene ca drupadam saṃkhye sa anubandham parājitam

original: 01,123.068a kasya cit tv atha kālasya saśiṣyo 'ṅgirasāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: kasya cit tu atha kālasya sa śiṣyaḥ ṅgirasām varaḥ
jagāma gaṅgām abhitas majjitum bharata ṛṣabha
avagāḍham atho droṇam salile salilecaraḥ
grāhaḥ jagrāha balavān jaṅghā ante kāla coditaḥ

original: 01,123.070a sa samartho 'pi mokṣāya śiṣyān sarvān acodayat
analyzed: sa samarthaḥ pi mokṣāya śiṣyān sarvān acodayat

original: 01,123.070c grāhaṃ hatvā mokṣayadhvaṃ mām iti tvarayann iva
analyzed: grāham hatvā mokṣayadhvam mām iti tvarayan iva
tad vākya sama kālam tu bībhatsuḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 01,123.071c āvāpaiḥ pañcabhir grāhaṃ magnam ambhasy atāḍayat
analyzed: āvāpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ grāham magnam ambhasi atāḍayat

original: 01,123.071e itare tu visaṃmūḍhās tatra tatra prapedire
analyzed: itare tu visaṃmūḍhāḥ tatra tatra prapedire

original: 01,123.072a taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā kriyopetaṃ droṇo 'manyata pāṇḍavam
analyzed: tam ca dṛṣṭvā kriyā upetam droṇaḥ manyata pāṇḍavam
viśiṣṭam sarva śiṣyebhyaḥ prītimān ca abhavat tadā
sa pārtha bāṇaiḥ bahudhā khaṇḍaśas parikalpitaḥ

original: 01,123.073c grāhaḥ pañcatvam āpede jaṅghāṃ tyaktvā mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: grāhaḥ pañcatvam āpede jaṅghām tyaktvā mahātmanaḥ
atha abravīt mahātmānam bhāradvājaḥ mahā ratham
gṛhāṇa idam mahā bāho viśiṣṭam ati durdharam
astram brahmaśiraḥ nāma saprayoganivartanam

original: 01,123.075a na ca te mānuṣeṣv etat prayoktavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na ca te mānuṣeṣu etat prayoktavyam katham cana
jagat vinirdahet etat alpa tejasi pātitam

original: 01,123.076a asāmānyam idaṃ tāta lokeṣv astraṃ nigadyate
analyzed: asāmānyam idam tāta lokeṣu astram nigadyate

original: 01,123.076c tad dhārayethāḥ prayataḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
analyzed: tat dhārayethāḥ prayataḥ śṛṇu ca idam vacaḥ mama

original: 01,123.077a bādhetāmānuṣaḥ śatrur yadā tvāṃ vīra kaś cana
analyzed: bādheta amānuṣaḥ śatruḥ yadā tvām vīra kaḥ cana
tad vadhāya prayuñjīthāḥ tadā astram idam āhave

original: 01,123.078a tatheti tat pratiśrutya bībhatsuḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: tathā iti tat pratiśrutya bībhatsuḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 01,123.078c jagrāha paramāstraṃ tad āha cainaṃ punar guruḥ
analyzed: jagrāha parama astram tat āha ca enam punar guruḥ

original: 01,123.078e bhavitā tvatsamo nānyaḥ pumāṃl loke dhanurdharaḥ
analyzed: bhavitā tvad samaḥ nā anyaḥ pumān loke dhanurdharaḥ
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,124.001a kṛtāstrān dhārtarāṣṭrāṃś ca pāṇḍuputrāṃś ca bhārata
analyzed: kṛtāstrān dhārtarāṣṭrān ca pāṇḍu putrān ca bhārata
dṛṣṭvā droṇaḥ bravīt rājan dhṛtarāṣṭram janeśvaram
kṛpasya somadattasya vāhlīkasya ca dhīmataḥ

original: 01,124.002c gāṅgeyasya ca sāṃnidhye vyāsasya vidurasya ca
analyzed: gāṅgeyasya ca sāṃnidhye vyāsasya vidurasya ca

original: 01,124.002d*1405_01 trayāṇām iva lokānāṃ prajāpatim iva sthitam
analyzed: trayāṇām iva lokānām prajāpatim iva sthitam
rājan saṃprāpta vidyāḥ te kumarāḥ kuru sattama

original: 01,124.003c te darśayeyuḥ svāṃ śikṣāṃ rājann anumate tava
analyzed: te darśayeyuḥ svām śikṣām rājan anumate tava
tatas bravīt mahā rājaḥ prahṛṣṭena antarātmanā

original: 01,124.004c bhāradvāja mahat karma kṛtaṃ te dvijasattama
analyzed: bhāradvāja mahat karma kṛtam te dvijasattama

original: 01,124.005a yadā tu manyase kālaṃ yasmin deśe yathā yathā
analyzed: yadā tu manyase kālam yasmin deśe yathā yathā

original: 01,124.005c tathā tathā vidhānāya svayam ājñāpayasva mām
analyzed: tathā tathā vidhānāya svayam ājñāpayasva mām
spṛhayāmi adya nirvedāt puruṣāṇām sa cakṣuṣām

original: 01,124.006c astrahetoḥ parākrāntān ye me drakṣyanti putrakān
analyzed: astra hetoḥ parākrāntān ye me drakṣyanti putrakān

original: 01,124.007a kṣattar yad gurur ācāryo bravīti kuru tat tathā
analyzed: kṣattar yat guruḥ ācāryaḥ bravīti kuru tat tathā

original: 01,124.007c na hīdṛśaṃ priyaṃ manye bhavitā dharmavatsala
analyzed: na hi īdṛśam priyam manye bhavitā dharma vatsala
tatas rājānam āmantrya vidura anugataḥ bahis
bhāradvājaḥ mahā prājñaḥ māpayām āsa medinīm
prekṣya āgāram su vipulam śāstra dṛṣṭyā yathāvidhi
samām avṛkṣām nirgulmām udak pravaṇa saṃsthitām

original: 01,124.009a tasyāṃ bhūmau baliṃ cakre tithau nakṣatrapūjite
analyzed: tasyām bhūmau balim cakre tithau nakṣatra pūjite

original: 01,124.009c avaghuṣṭaṃ pure cāpi tadarthaṃ vadatāṃ vara
analyzed: avaghuṣṭam pure ca api tad artham vadatām vara
raṅgabhūmau su vipulam śāstra dṛṣṭam yathāvidhi

original: 01,124.010c prekṣāgāraṃ suvihitaṃ cakrus tatra ca śilpinaḥ
analyzed: prekṣāgāram su vihitam cakruḥ tatra ca śilpinaḥ
rājñaḥ sarva āyudha upetam strīṇām ca eva nara ṛṣabha
vipulān akarot darśana īpsayā

original: 01,124.011a mañcāṃś ca kārayām āsus tatra jānapadā janāḥ
analyzed: mañcān ca kārayām āsuḥ tatra jānapadāḥ janāḥ
vipulān ucchraya upetām śibikāḥ ca mahādhanāḥ

original: 01,124.012a tasmiṃs tato 'hani prāpte rājā sasacivas tadā
analyzed: tasmin tatas hani prāpte rājā sa sacivaḥ tadā
sa antaḥpuraḥ sahāmātyaḥ vyāsasya anumate tadā
bhīṣmam pramukhatas kṛtvā kṛpam ca ācārya sattamam

original: 01,124.012d*1409_01 bāhlīkaṃ somadattaṃ ca bhūriśravasam eva ca
analyzed: vāhlīkam somadattam ca bhūriśravasam eva ca

original: 01,124.012d*1409_02 kurūn anyāṃś ca sacivān ādāya nagarād bahiḥ
analyzed: kurūn anyān ca sacivān ādāya nagarāt bahis
raṅgabhūmim samāsādya brāhmaṇaiḥ sahitaḥ nṛpaḥ
muktā jāla parikṣiptam vaiḍūrya maṇi bhūṣitam
śātakumbha mayam divyam prekṣāgāram upāgamat

original: 01,124.014a gāndhārī ca mahābhāgā kuntī ca jayatāṃ vara
analyzed: gāndhārī ca mahābhāgā kuntī ca jayatām vara

original: 01,124.014c striyaś ca sarvā yā rājñaḥ sapreṣyāḥ saparicchadāḥ
analyzed: striyaḥ ca sarvāḥ yāḥ rājñaḥ sa preṣyāḥ sa paricchadāḥ

original: 01,124.014e harṣād āruruhur mañcān meruṃ devastriyo yathā
analyzed: harṣāt āruruhuḥ mañcān merum deva striyaḥ yathā
brāhmaṇa kṣatriya ādyam ca cāturvarṇyam purāt drutam
darśana īpsu samabhyāgāt kumārāṇām kṛtāstra tām
kṣaṇena ekastha tām tatra darśana īpsu jagāma ha
pravāditaiḥ ca vāditraiḥ jana kautūhalena ca

original: 01,124.016c mahārṇava iva kṣubdhaḥ samājaḥ so 'bhavat tadā
analyzed: mahā arṇavaḥ iva kṣubdhaḥ samājaḥ saḥ bhavat tadā
tatas śukla ambara dharaḥ śukla yajña upavītavān
śukla keśaḥ sita śmaśruḥ śukla mālya anulepanaḥ
raṅga madhyam tadā ācāryaḥ sa putraḥ praviveśa ha
nabhaḥ jaladharaiḥ hīnam sāṅgārakaḥ iva aṃśumān

original: 01,124.019a sa yathāsamayaṃ cakre baliṃ balavatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: sa yathāsamayam cakre balim balavatām varaḥ

original: 01,124.019c brāhmaṇāṃś cātra mantrajñān vācayām āsa maṅgalam
analyzed: brāhmaṇān ca atra mantra jñān vācayām āsa maṅgalam
suvarṇa maṇi ratnāni vastrāṇi vividhāni ca

original: 01,124.019d*1411_02 pradadau dakṣiṇāṃ rājā droṇasya ca kṛpasya ca
analyzed: pradadau dakṣiṇām rājā droṇasya ca kṛpasya ca
atha puṇya aha ghoṣasya puṇyasya tad anantaram
viviśuḥ vividham gṛhya śastra upakaraṇam narāḥ
tatas baddha tanutrāṇāḥ baddha kakṣyāḥ mahā balāḥ
baddha tūṇāḥ sa dhanuṣaḥ viviśuḥ bharata ṛṣabhāḥ
anujyeṣṭham ca te tatra yudhiṣṭhira purogamāḥ
raṅga madhye sthitam droṇam abhivādya nara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 01,124.022b*1412_02 cakruḥ pūjāṃ yathānyāyaṃ droṇasya ca kṛpasya ca
analyzed: cakruḥ pūjām yathānyāyam droṇasya ca kṛpasya ca
āśīrbhiḥ ca prayuktābhiḥ sarve saṃhṛṣṭa mānasāḥ
abhivādya punar śastrān bali puṣpaiḥ samarcitān
raktacandana saṃmiśraiḥ svayam arcanta kauravāḥ
raktacandana digdhāḥ ca rakta mālya anudhāriṇaḥ
sarve rakta patākāḥ ca sarve rakta anta locanāḥ
droṇena samanujñātāḥ gṛhya śastram paraṃtapāḥ
dhanūṃṣi pūrvam saṃgṛhya tapta kāñcana bhūṣitāḥ
sajjāni vividha ākārāḥ śaraiḥ saṃdhāya kauravāḥ
jyā ghoṣa tala ghoṣam ca kṛtvā bhūtāni apūjayan
śastra mārgān yathā utsṛṣṭān ceruḥ sarve nara ṛṣabhāḥ
cakruḥ astram mahā vīryāḥ kumārāḥ parama adbhutam

original: 01,124.022d*1414_01 keṣāṃ cit tarumūleṣu śarā nipatitā nṛpa
analyzed: keṣām cit taru mūleṣu śarāḥ nipatitāḥ nṛpa

original: 01,124.022d*1414_02 keṣāṃ cit puṣpamukuṭe nipatanti sma sāyakāḥ
analyzed: keṣām cit puṣpa mukuṭe nipatanti sma sāyakāḥ

original: 01,124.022d*1414_03 ke cil lakṣyāṇi vividhair bāṇair āhatalakṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: ke cit lakṣyāṇi vividhaiḥ bāṇaiḥ āhata lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: 01,124.022d*1414_04 vivyadhur lāghavotsṛṣṭair gurūṇi ca laghūni ca
analyzed: vivyadhuḥ lāghava utsṛṣṭaiḥ gurūṇi ca laghūni ca
ke cit śara ākṣepa bhayāt śirāṃsi avananāmire

original: 01,124.023c manujā dhṛṣṭam apare vīkṣāṃ cakruḥ savismayāḥ
analyzed: manujāḥ dhṛṣṭam apare vīkṣām cakruḥ sa vismayāḥ

original: 01,124.024a te sma lakṣyāṇi vividhur bāṇair nāmāṅkaśobhitaiḥ
analyzed: te sma lakṣyāṇi vividhuḥ bāṇaiḥ nāma aṅka śobhitaiḥ
vividhaiḥ lāghava utsṛṣṭaiḥ uhyantaḥ vājibhiḥ drutam
tat kumāra balam tatra gṛhīta śara kārmukam
gandharvanagara ākāram prekṣya te vismitāḥ abhavan
sahasā cukruśuḥ tatra narāḥ śata sahasraśas
vismaya utphulla nayanāḥ sādhu sādhu iti bhārata

original: 01,124.027a kṛtvā dhanuṣi te mārgān rathacaryāsu cāsakṛt
analyzed: kṛtvā dhanuṣi te mārgān ratha caryāsu ca asakṛt
gaja pṛṣṭhe śva pṛṣṭhe ca niyuddhe ca mahā balāḥ
gṛhīta khaḍga carmāṇaḥ tatas bhūyas prahāriṇaḥ
tsaru mārgān yathā uddiṣṭān ceruḥ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu
lāghavam sauṣṭhavam śobhām sthira tvam dṛḍha muṣṭi tām
dadṛśuḥ tatra sarveṣām prayoge khaḍga carmaṇām
atha tau nitya saṃhṛṣṭau suyodhana vṛkodarau
avatīrṇau gadā hastau eka śṛṅgau iva acalau
baddha kakṣyau mahā bāhū pauruṣe paryavasthitau
bṛṃhantau vāśitā hetoḥ sa madau iva kuñjarau
tau pradakṣiṇa savyāni maṇḍalāni mahā balau
ceratuḥ nirmala gadau sa madau iva go vṛṣau
viduraḥ dhṛtarāṣṭrāya gāndhāryai pāṇḍava araṇiḥ
nyavedayetām tat sarvam kumārāṇām viceṣṭitam
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,125.001a kururāje ca raṅgasthe bhīme ca balināṃ vare
analyzed: kuru rāje ca raṅga sthe bhīme ca balinām vare
pakṣapāta kṛta snehaḥ sa dvidhā iva abhavat janaḥ

original: 01,125.002a hā vīra kururājeti hā bhīmeti ca nardatām
analyzed: hā vīra kuru rāja iti hā bhīma iti ca nardatām
puruṣāṇām su vipulāḥ praṇādāḥ sahasā utthitāḥ
tatas kṣubdha arṇava nibham raṅgam ālokya buddhimān
bhāradvājaḥ priyam putram aśvatthāmānam abravīt
vāraya etau mahā vīryau kṛta yogyau ubhau api
mā bhūt raṅga prakopaḥ yam bhīma duryodhana udbhavaḥ
tatas utthāya vegena aśvatthāmā nyavārayat

original: 01,125.004d*1415_02 guror ājñā bhīma iti gāndhāre guruśāsanam
analyzed: guroḥ ājñā bhīmaḥ iti gāndhāre guru śāsanam

original: 01,125.004d*1415_03 alaṃ yogyākṛtaṃ vegam alaṃ sāhasam ity uta
analyzed: alam yogyā kṛtam vegam alam sāhasam iti uta
tatas tau udyata gadau guru putreṇa vāritau
yugānta anila saṃkṣubdhau mahā vegau iva arṇavau
tatas raṅga aṅgaṇa gataḥ droṇaḥ vacanam abravīt
nivārya vāditra gaṇam mahā megha nibha svanam

original: 01,125.007a yo me putrāt priyataraḥ sarvāstraviduṣāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ me putrāt priyataraḥ sarva astra viduṣām varaḥ

original: 01,145.002a ekacakrāṃ gatās te tu kuntīputrā mahārathāḥ
analyzed: ekacakrām gatāḥ te tu kuntī putrāḥ mahā rathāḥ
ūṣuḥ na aticiram kālam brāhmaṇasya niveśane

original: 01,145.003c pārthivān api coddeśān saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
analyzed: pārthivān api ca uddeśān saritaḥ ca sarāṃsi ca

original: 01,145.004a cerur bhaikṣaṃ tadā te tu sarva eva viśāṃ pate
analyzed: ceruḥ bhaikṣam tadā te tu sarve eva viśām pate

original: 01,145.004b*1586_01 yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca kuntīṃ ca cintayanta upāsate
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiram ca kuntīm ca cintayantaḥ upāsate

original: 01,145.004b*1586_02 bhaikṣaṃ carantas tu sadā jaṭilā brahmacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: bhaikṣam carantaḥ tu sadā jaṭilāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: 01,145.004c babhūvur nāgarāṇāṃ ca svair guṇaiḥ priyadarśanāḥ
analyzed: babhūvuḥ nāgarāṇām ca svaiḥ guṇaiḥ priya darśanāḥ
nāgarāḥ
darśanīyāḥ dvijāḥ śuddhāḥ deva garbha upamāḥ śubhāḥ

original: 01,145.004d*1587_02 bhaikṣārhā na ca rājyārhāḥ sukumārās tapasvinaḥ
analyzed: bhaikṣa arhāḥ na ca rājya arhāḥ sukumārāḥ tapasvinaḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannāḥ bhaikṣam na arhanti nityaśas
kārya arthinaḥ caranti iti tarkayantaḥ iti bruvan

original: 01,145.004d*1587_05 bandhūnām āgamān nityam upacintya tu nāgarāḥ
analyzed: bandhūnām āgamāt nityam upacintya tu nāgarāḥ
bhojanāni ca pūrṇāni bhakṣya bhojyaiḥ akārayan

original: 01,145.004d*1587_08 mātā ciragatān dṛṣṭvā śocantīti ca pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: mātā cira gatān dṛṣṭvā śocanti iti ca pāṇḍavāḥ
tvaramāṇāḥ nivartante mātṛ gaurava yantritāḥ
na ete yathārthataḥ viprāḥ sukumārāḥ tapasvinaḥ

original: 01,145.004d*1588_02 caranti bhūmau pracchannāḥ kasmāc cit kāraṇād iha
analyzed: caranti bhūmau pracchannāḥ kasmāt cit kāraṇāt iha
duḥkha aśru pūrṇa nayanāḥ likhantyāḥ te mahī talam

original: 01,145.005a nivedayanti sma ca te bhaikṣaṃ kuntyāḥ sadā niśi
analyzed: nivedayanti sma ca te bhaikṣam kuntyāḥ sadā niśi
sarva saṃpūrṇa bhaikṣa annam mātrā dattam pṛthak pṛthak

original: 01,145.005c tayā vibhaktān bhāgāṃs te bhuñjate sma pṛthak pṛthak
analyzed: tayā vibhaktān bhāgān te bhuñjate sma pṛthak pṛthak

original: 01,145.006a ardhaṃ te bhuñjate vīrāḥ saha mātrā paraṃtapāḥ
analyzed: ardham te bhuñjate vīrāḥ saha mātrā paraṃtapāḥ

original: 01,145.006c ardhaṃ bhaikṣasya sarvasya bhīmo bhuṅkte mahābalaḥ
analyzed: ardham bhaikṣasya sarvasya bhīmaḥ bhuṅkte mahā balaḥ
na sau bhavati kalyāṇa anna bhṛtaḥ purā

original: 01,145.006d*1591_02 sa vaivarṇyaṃ ca kārśyaṃ ca jagāmātṛptikāritam
analyzed: sa vaivarṇyam ca kārśyam ca jagāma atṛpti kāritam

original: 01,145.006d*1592_01 ājyabindur yathā vahnau mahati jvalite yathā
analyzed: ājya binduḥ yathā vahnau mahati jvalite yathā
tathā ardha bhāgam bhīmasya bhikṣā annasya nṛpa uttama

original: 01,145.007a tathā tu teṣāṃ vasatāṃ tatra rājan mahātmanām
analyzed: tathā tu teṣām vasatām tatra rājan mahātmanām
aticakrāma su mahān bharata ṛṣabha
bhīmaḥ pi krīḍayitvā tu mithas brāhmaṇa bandhuṣu

original: 01,145.007d*1593_02 kumbhakāreṇa saṃbandhaṃ lebhe pātraṃ bṛhat tadā
analyzed: kumbhakāreṇa saṃbandham lebhe pātram bṛhat tadā

original: 01,145.007d*1593_03 sa dadāti mahat pātraṃ bhīmāya prahasann iva
analyzed: sa dadāti mahat pātram bhīmāya prahasan iva

original: 01,145.007d*1593_04 tasyādbhutaṃ karma kṛtvā mahan mṛdbhāram ādade
analyzed: tasya adbhutam karma kṛtvā mahat mṛd bhāram ādade
tasya bhāraḥ śataguṇaḥ kumbhakāram atoṣayat

original: 01,145.007d*1593_06 cakre cakre ca mṛdbhāṇḍān satataṃ bhaikṣam āharan
analyzed: cakre cakre ca mṛd bhāṇḍān satatam bhaikṣam āharan

original: 01,145.007d*1593_07 tad ādāya gataṃ dṛṣṭvā hasanti prahasanti ca
analyzed: tat ādāya gatam dṛṣṭvā hasanti prahasanti ca
bhakṣya bhojyāni vividhāni ādāya prakṣipanti ca

original: 01,145.007d*1593_09 evam eṣa sadā bhuktvā mātre vadati vai rahaḥ
analyzed: evam eṣa sadā bhuktvā mātre vadati vai rahaḥ

original: 01,145.007d*1594_01 kumbhakāro 'dadāt pātraṃ mahat kṛtvā tu pātrakam
analyzed: kumbhakāraḥ dadāt pātram mahat kṛtvā tu pātrakam

original: 01,145.007d*1595_01 iti pṛṣṭaḥ sadā pauraiḥ kṣudhitaḥ kila pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: iti pṛṣṭaḥ sadā pauraiḥ kṣudhitaḥ kila pāṇḍavaḥ

original: 01,145.008a tataḥ kadā cid bhaikṣāya gatās te bharatarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: tatas kadā cit bhaikṣāya gatāḥ te bharata ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 01,145.008c saṃgatyā bhīmasenas tu tatrāste pṛthayā saha
analyzed: saṃgatyā bhīmasenaḥ tu tatra āste pṛthayā saha
atha ārti jam mahā śabdam brāhmaṇasya niveśane

original: 01,145.009c bhṛśam utpatitaṃ ghoraṃ kuntī śuśrāva bhārata
analyzed: bhṛśam utpatitam ghoram kuntī śuśrāva bhārata

original: 01,145.010a rorūyamāṇāṃs tān sarvān paridevayataś ca sā
analyzed: rorūyamāṇān tān sarvān paridevayataḥ ca sā

original: 01,145.010c kāruṇyāt sādhubhāvāc ca devī rājan na cakṣame
analyzed: kāruṇyāt sādhu bhāvāt ca devī rājan na cakṣame
mathyamānā iva duḥkhena hṛdayena pṛthā tatas

original: 01,145.011c uvāca bhīmaṃ kalyāṇī kṛpānvitam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca bhīmam kalyāṇī kṛpā anvitam idam vacaḥ
vasāmaḥ su sukham putra brāhmaṇasya niveśane
ajñātāḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇām satkṛtāḥ vīta manyavaḥ

original: 01,145.013a sā cintaye sadā putra brāhmaṇasyāsya kiṃ nv aham
analyzed: sā cintaye sadā putra brāhmaṇasya asya kim nu aham

original: 01,145.013c priyaṃ kuryām iti gṛhe yat kuryur uṣitāḥ sukham
analyzed: priyam kuryām iti gṛhe yat kuryuḥ uṣitāḥ sukham

original: 01,145.014a etāvān puruṣas tāta kṛtaṃ yasmin na naśyati
analyzed: etāvān puruṣaḥ tāta kṛtam yasmin na naśyati

original: 01,145.014c yāvac ca kuryād anyo 'sya kuryād abhyadhikaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: yāvat ca kuryāt kuryāt abhyadhikam tatas

original: 01,145.015a tad idaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsya duḥkham āpatitaṃ dhruvam
analyzed: tat idam brāhmaṇasya asya duḥkham āpatitam dhruvam

original: 01,145.015c tatrāsya yadi sāhāyyaṃ kuryāma sukṛtaṃ bhavet
analyzed: tatra asya yadi sāhāyyam kuryāma sukṛtam bhavet
bhīmaḥ uvāca

original: 01,145.016a jñāyatām asya yad duḥkhaṃ yataś caiva samutthitam
analyzed: jñāyatām asya yat duḥkham yatas ca eva samutthitam

original: 01,145.016c vidite vyavasiṣyāmi yady api syāt suduṣkaram
analyzed: vidite vyavasiṣyāmi yadi api syāt su duṣkaram
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,145.017a tathā hi kathayantau tau bhūyaḥ śuśruvatuḥ svanam
analyzed: tathā hi kathayantau tau bhūyas śuśruvatuḥ svanam

original: 01,145.017c ārtijaṃ tasya viprasya sabhāryasya viśāṃ pate
analyzed: ārti jam tasya viprasya sa bhāryasya viśām pate
antaḥpuram tatas tasya brāhmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
viveśa kuntī tvaritā baddha vatsā iva saurabhī

original: 01,145.019a tatas taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tatra bhāryayā ca sutena ca
analyzed: tatas tam brāhmaṇam tatra bhāryayā ca sutena ca
duhitrā ca eva sahitam dadarśa vikṛta ānanam
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca
dhik idam jīvitam loke nala sāram anarthakam
duḥkha mūlam para adhīnam bhṛśam apriya bhāgi ca

original: 01,145.021a jīvite paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvite paramo jvaraḥ
analyzed: jīvite paramam duḥkham jīvite paramaḥ jvaraḥ

original: 01,145.022a ekātmāpi hi dharmārthau kāmaṃ ca na niṣevate
analyzed: ekātmā api hi dharma arthau kāmam ca na niṣevate

original: 01,145.022c etaiś ca viprayogo 'pi duḥkhaṃ paramakaṃ matam
analyzed: etaiḥ ca viprayogaḥ duḥkham paramakam matam

original: 01,145.023a āhuḥ ke cit paraṃ mokṣaṃ sa ca nāsti kathaṃ cana
analyzed: āhuḥ ke cid param mokṣam sa ca na asti katham cana
artha prāptau ca narakaḥ kṛtsnaḥ eva upapadyate
artha īpsu tā param duḥkham artha prāptau tatas dhikam

original: 01,145.024d*1596_03 tad idaṃ jīvitaṃ prāpya svalpakālaṃ mahābhayam
analyzed: tat idam jīvitam prāpya su alpa kālam mahā bhayam

original: 01,145.024d*1596_04 tyāgo 'py ayaṃ mahān prāpto bhāryayā sahitena ca

original: 01,145.025a na hi yogaṃ prapaśyāmi yena mucyeyam āpadaḥ

original: 01,145.026a yatitaṃ vai mayā pūrvaṃ yathā tvaṃ vettha brāhmaṇi

original: 01,145.026c yataḥ kṣemaṃ tato gantuṃ tvayā tu mama na śrutam
analyzed: yatas kṣemam tatas gantum tvayā tu mama na śrutam

original: 01,145.027a iha jātā vivṛddhāsmi pitā ceha mameti ca
analyzed: iha jātā vivṛddhā asmi pitā ca iha mama iti ca

original: 01,145.028a svargato hi pitā vṛddhas tathā mātā ciraṃ tava

original: 01,145.028c bāndhavā bhūtapūrvāś ca tatra vāse tu kā ratiḥ
analyzed: bāndhavāḥ bhūtapūrvāḥ ca tatra vāse tu kā ratiḥ

original: 01,145.028d*1597_01 na bhojanaṃ viruddhaṃ syān na strī deśo nibandhanam
analyzed: na bhojanam viruddham syāt na strī deśaḥ nibandhanam
su dūram api kārya arthe vrajet garuḍa haṃsa vat

upasthitam tu kalyāṇi yathā iṣṭam anubhūyatām
brāhmaṇī

original: 01,145.029d*1599_01 mām eva preṣaya tvaṃ tu bakāya karam adya vai
analyzed: mām eva preṣaya tvam tu bakāya karam adya vai
dvijaḥ

original: 01,145.029d*1600_01 tyāgo 'yaṃ mama saṃprāpto mama vā me sutasya vā
analyzed: tyāgaḥ yam mama saṃprāptaḥ mama vā me sutasya vā

original: 01,145.029d*1600_02 tava vā tava putryāś ca atra vāsasya tat phalam
analyzed: tava vā tava putryāḥ ca atra vāsasya tat phalam

original: 01,145.029d*1600_03 na śṛṇoṣi vaco mahyaṃ tat phalaṃ bhuṅkṣva bhāmini
analyzed: na śṛṇoṣi vacaḥ mahyam tat phalam bhuṅkṣva bhāmini

original: 01,145.029d*1600_04 athavāhaṃ na śakṣyāmi svayaṃ martuṃ sutaṃ mama
analyzed: athavā aham na śakṣyāmi svayam martum sutam mama

original: 01,145.029d*1600_05 evaṃ tyaktuṃ na śaknomi bhavatīṃ na sutām api
analyzed: evam tyaktum na śaknomi bhavatīm na sutām api

original: 01,145.030a athavā madvināśo 'yaṃ na hi śakṣyāmi kaṃ cana
analyzed: athavā mad vināśaḥ yam na hi śakṣyāmi kam cana

original: 01,145.030c parityaktum ahaṃ bandhuṃ svayaṃ jīvan nṛśaṃsavat
analyzed: parityaktum aham bandhum svayam jīvan nṛśaṃsa vat
sahadharma carīm dāntām nityam mātṛ samām mama

original: 01,145.031c sakhāyaṃ vihitāṃ devair nityaṃ paramikāṃ gatim
analyzed: sakhāyam vihitām devaiḥ nityam paramikām gatim

original: 01,145.032a mātrā pitrā ca vihitāṃ sadā gārhasthyabhāginīm
analyzed: mātrā pitrā ca vihitām sadā gārhasthya bhāginīm
varayitvā yathānyāyam mantravat pariṇīya ca
kulīnām śīla saṃpannām apatya jananīm mama
tvām aham jīvitasya arthe sādhvīm anapakāriṇīm

original: 01,145.033e parityaktuṃ na śakṣyāmi bhāryāṃ nityam anuvratām
analyzed: parityaktum na śakṣyāmi bhāryām nityam anuvratām

original: 01,145.034a kuta eva parityaktuṃ sutāṃ śakṣyāmy ahaṃ svayam
analyzed: kutas eva parityaktum sutām śakṣyāmi aham svayam
bālām aprāpta vayasam ajāta vyañjana ākṛtim

original: 01,145.034d*1601_01 sutāṃ caināṃ na śakṣyāmi parityaktuṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: sutām ca enām na śakṣyāmi parityaktum katham cana

original: 01,145.034d*1602_01 prārthaye 'haṃ parāṃ prītiṃ yasmin svargaphalāni ca
analyzed: prārthaye ham parām prītim yasmin svarga phalāni ca

original: 01,145.034d*1602_02 dayitaṃ me kathaṃ bālam ahaṃ tyaktum ihotsahe
analyzed: dayitam me katham bālam aham tyaktum iha utsahe

original: 01,145.034d*1602_03 yasya jātasya pitaro mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā divaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: yasya jātasya pitaraḥ mukham dṛṣṭvā divam gatāḥ
pitṝṇām ṛṇa nirmuktaḥ yasya jātasya tejasā

original: 01,145.034d*1602_05 tam ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaputraṃ me kulanistārakaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: tam aham jyeṣṭha putram me kula nistārakam bhuvi
mama piṇḍa udaka nidhim katham tyakṣyāmi putrakam

original: 01,145.034d*1603_01 kuta eva parityaktuṃ putrīṃ śakṣyāmy ahaṃ svayam
analyzed: kutas eva parityaktum putrīm śakṣyāmi aham svayam

original: 01,145.035a bhartur arthāya nikṣiptāṃ nyāsaṃ dhātrā mahātmanā
analyzed: bhartuḥ arthāya nikṣiptām nyāsam dhātrā mahātmanā

original: 01,145.035c yasyāṃ dauhitrajāṃl lokān āśaṃse pitṛbhiḥ saha
analyzed: yasyām dauhitra jān lokān āśaṃse pitṛbhiḥ saha

original: 01,145.035e svayam utpādya tāṃ bālāṃ katham utsraṣṭum utsahe
analyzed: svayam utpādya tām bālām katham utsraṣṭum utsahe

original: 01,145.036a manyante ke cid adhikaṃ snehaṃ putre pitur narāḥ
analyzed: manyante ke cit adhikam sneham putre pituḥ narāḥ

original: 01,145.036c kanyāyāṃ naiva tu punar mama tulyāv ubhau matau
analyzed: kanyāyām nā eva tu punar mama tulyau ubhau matau

original: 01,145.037a yasmiṃl lokāḥ prasūtiś ca sthitā nityam atho sukham
analyzed: yasmin lokāḥ prasūtiḥ ca sthitā nityam atho sukham

original: 01,145.037c apāpāṃ tām ahaṃ bālāṃ katham utsraṣṭum utsahe
analyzed: apāpām tām aham bālām katham utsraṣṭum utsahe
medhāvinīm adoṣām ca śuśrūṣum anahaṃkṛtām

original: 01,145.037d*1604_02 tām imāṃ me sutāṃ bālāṃ katham utsraṣṭum utsahe
analyzed: tām imām me sutām bālām katham utsraṣṭum utsahe

original: 01,145.037d*1604_03 kāṅkṣamāṇāṃ ratiṃ caiva sukhāni ca bahūny api
analyzed: kāṅkṣamāṇām ratim ca eva sukhāni ca bahūni api
utpādayanti apatyāni dharma kāma artha hetave

original: 01,145.038a ātmānam api cotsṛjya tapsye pretavaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: ātmānam api ca utsṛjya tapsye preta vaśam gataḥ

original: 01,145.038b*1605_01 svayaṃ ca na parityaktuṃ śaknomy etān ahaṃ yathā
analyzed: svayam ca na parityaktum śaknomi etān aham yathā

original: 01,145.038c tyaktā hy ete mayā vyaktaṃ neha śakṣyanti jīvitum
analyzed: tyaktāḥ hi ete mayā vyaktam na iha śakṣyanti jīvitum
eṣām ca anyatama tyāgaḥ nṛśaṃsaḥ garhitaḥ budhaiḥ

original: 01,145.039c ātmatyāge kṛte ceme mariṣyanti mayā vinā
analyzed: ātma tyāge kṛte ca ime mariṣyanti mayā vinā

original: 01,145.040a sa kṛcchrām aham āpanno na śaktas tartum āpadam
analyzed: sa kṛcchrām aham āpannaḥ na śaktaḥ tartum āpadam

original: 01,145.040c aho dhik kāṃ gatiṃ tv adya gamiṣyāmi sabāndhavaḥ
analyzed: aho dhik kām gatim tu adya gamiṣyāmi sa bāndhavaḥ

original: 01,145.040e sarvaiḥ saha mṛtaṃ śreyo na tu me jīvitaṃ kṣamam
analyzed: sarvaiḥ saha mṛtam śreyaḥ na tu me jīvitam kṣamam
brāhmaṇī uvāca

original: 01,146.001a na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ prākṛteneva karhi cit
analyzed: na saṃtāpaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ prākṛtena iva karhi cit

original: 01,146.001c na hi saṃtāpakālo 'yaṃ vaidyasya tava vidyate
analyzed: na hi saṃtāpa kālaḥ yam vaidyasya tava vidyate

original: 01,146.002a avaśyaṃ nidhanaṃ sarvair gantavyam iha mānavaiḥ
analyzed: avaśyam nidhanam sarvaiḥ gantavyam iha mānavaiḥ

original: 01,146.002c avaśyabhāviny arthe vai saṃtāpo neha vidyate
analyzed: avaśya bhāvini arthe vai saṃtāpaḥ na iha vidyate

original: 01,146.003a bhāryā putro 'tha duhitā sarvam ātmārtham iṣyate
analyzed: bhāryā duhitā sarvam ātma artham iṣyate

original: 01,146.003c vyathāṃ jahi subuddhyā tvaṃ svayaṃ yāsyāmi tatra vai
analyzed: vyathām jahi su buddhyā tvam svayam yāsyāmi tatra vai

original: 01,146.004a etad dhi paramaṃ nāryāḥ kāryaṃ loke sanātanam
analyzed: etat hi paramam nāryāḥ kāryam loke sanātanam

original: 01,146.004c prāṇān api parityajya yad bhartṛhitam ācaret
analyzed: prāṇān api parityajya yat bhartṛ hitam ācaret

original: 01,146.005a tac ca tatra kṛtaṃ karma tavāpīha sukhāvaham
analyzed: tat ca tatra kṛtam karma tava api iha sukha āvaham

original: 01,146.005c bhavaty amutra cākṣayyaṃ loke 'smiṃś ca yaśaskaram
analyzed: bhavati amutra ca akṣayyam loke smin ca yaśaskaram

original: 01,146.006a eṣa caiva gurur dharmo yaṃ pravakṣāmy ahaṃ tava
analyzed: eṣa ca eva guruḥ dharmaḥ yam pravakṣāmi aham tava

original: 01,146.006c arthaś ca tava dharmaś ca bhūyān atra pradṛśyate
analyzed: arthaḥ ca tava dharmaḥ ca bhūyān atra pradṛśyate

original: 01,146.007a yadartham iṣyate bhāryā prāptaḥ so 'rthas tvayā mayi
analyzed: yad artham iṣyate bhāryā prāptaḥ saḥ ṛthaḥ tvayā mayi

original: 01,146.007c kanyā caiva kumāraś ca kṛtāham anṛṇā tvayā
analyzed: kanyā ca eva kumāraḥ ca kṛtā aham anṛṇā tvayā

original: 01,146.008a samarthaḥ poṣaṇe cāsi sutayo rakṣaṇe tathā
analyzed: samarthaḥ poṣaṇe ca asi sutayaḥ rakṣaṇe tathā

original: 01,146.008c na tv ahaṃ sutayoḥ śaktā tathā rakṣaṇapoṣaṇe
analyzed: na tu aham sutayoḥ śaktā tathā rakṣaṇa poṣaṇe

original: 01,146.009a mama hi tvadvihīnāyāḥ sarvakāmā na āpadaḥ
analyzed: mama hi tvad vihīnāyāḥ sarva kāmāḥ naḥ āpadaḥ

original: 01,146.009c kathaṃ syātāṃ sutau bālau bhaveyaṃ ca kathaṃ tv aham
analyzed: katham syātām sutau bālau bhaveyam ca katham tu aham

original: 01,146.010a kathaṃ hi vidhavānāthā bālaputrā vinā tvayā
analyzed: katham hi vidhavā anāthāḥ bāla putrāḥ vinā tvayā
mithunam jīvayiṣyāmi sthitā sādhu gate pathi
ahaṃkṛta avaliptaiḥ ca prārthyamānām imām sutām

original: 01,146.011c ayuktais tava saṃbandhe kathaṃ śakṣyāmi rakṣitum
analyzed: ayuktaiḥ tava saṃbandhe katham śakṣyāmi rakṣitum

original: 01,146.012a utsṛṣṭam āmiṣaṃ bhūmau prārthayanti yathā khagāḥ
analyzed: utsṛṣṭam āmiṣam bhūmau prārthayanti yathā khagāḥ

original: 01,146.012c prārthayanti janāḥ sarve vīrahīnāṃ tathā striyam
analyzed: prārthayanti janāḥ sarve vīra hīnām tathā striyam
sā aham vicālyamānā vai prārthyamānā durātmabhiḥ

original: 01,146.013c sthātuṃ pathi na śakṣyāmi sajjaneṣṭe dvijottama
analyzed: sthātum pathi na śakṣyāmi sat jana iṣṭe dvijottama
strī janma garhitam nātha loke duṣṭa jana ākule

original: 01,146.013d*1606_02 mātāpitror vaśe kanyā ūḍhā bhartṛvaśe tathā
analyzed: mātā pitroḥ vaśe kanyāḥ ūḍhāḥ bhartṛ vaśe tathā

original: 01,146.013d*1606_03 abhāve cānayoḥ putre svatantrā strī vigarhyate
analyzed: abhāve ca anayoḥ putre svatantrā strī vigarhyate

original: 01,146.013d*1606_04 anāthatvaṃ striyo dvāraṃ duṣṭānāṃ vivṛtaṃ hi tat
analyzed: anātha tvam striyaḥ dvāram duṣṭānām vivṛtam hi tat

original: 01,146.013d*1606_05 vastrakhaṇḍaṃ ghṛtāktaṃ hi yathā saṃkṛṣyate śvabhiḥ
analyzed: vastra khaṇḍam ghṛta aktam hi yathā saṃkṛṣyate śvabhiḥ
dṛṣṭvā tathā abalā nātha prārthita aiśvarya garvitaiḥ

original: 01,146.014a kathaṃ tava kulasyaikām imāṃ bālām asaṃskṛtām
analyzed: katham tava kulasya ekām imām bālām a saṃskṛtām
pitṛpaitāmahe mārge niyoktum aham utsahe

original: 01,146.015a kathaṃ śakṣyāmi bāle 'smin guṇān ādhātum īpṣitān
analyzed: katham śakṣyāmi bāle smin guṇān ādhātum īpṣitān

original: 01,146.015c anāthe sarvato lupte yathā tvaṃ dharmadarśivān
analyzed: anāthe sarvatas lupte yathā tvam dharma darśivān
ā dvādaśa abdam bālaḥ yam duścaritram cacāra ha

original: 01,146.015d*1607_02 mātāpitros tu tat pāpam ity āhur dharmavādinaḥ
analyzed: mātā pitroḥ tu tat pāpam iti āhuḥ dharma vādinaḥ

original: 01,146.015d*1607_03 śikṣaye tat pitā mātā tat putraś ca caritrataḥ
analyzed: śikṣaye tat pitā mātā tat putraḥ ca caritrataḥ

original: 01,146.016a imām api ca te bālām anāthāṃ paribhūya mām
analyzed: imām api ca te bālām anāthām paribhūya mām
anarhāḥ prārthayiṣyanti śūdrāḥ veda śrutim yathā

original: 01,146.017a tāṃ ced ahaṃ na ditseyaṃ tvadguṇair upabṛṃhitām
analyzed: tām ced aham na ditseyam tvad guṇaiḥ upabṛṃhitām

original: 01,146.017c pramathyaināṃ hareyus te havir dhvāṅkṣā ivādhvarāt
analyzed: pramathya enām hareyuḥ te haviḥ dhvāṅkṣāḥ iva adhvarāt
kaḥ syāḥ kartā bhavet iti

original: 01,146.017c*1608_02 paśyantyā me haranty eva krośantyāś cāpi nistrapāḥ
analyzed: paśyantyāḥ me haranti eva krośantyāḥ ca api nistrapāḥ
anātha tvāt sutām vidvan
saṃprekṣamāṇā putram te na anurūpam iva ātmanaḥ

original: 01,146.018c anarhavaśam āpannām imāṃ cāpi sutāṃ tava
analyzed: anarha vaśam āpannām imām ca api sutām tava
avajñātā ca lokasya tathā ātmānam a jānatī

original: 01,146.019c avaliptair narair brahman mariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: avaliptaiḥ naraiḥ brahman mariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
hrīyamāṇām anāgasāḥ
a śakta tvāt a nātha tvāt
mṛte tvayi mayā avaśyam sahāgamanam iṣyate

original: 01,146.019c*1610_02 mṛte bhartari nārīṇāṃ sukhaleśaṃ na vidyate
analyzed: mṛte bhartari nārīṇām sukha leśam na vidyate

original: 01,146.020a tau vihīnau mayā bālau tvayā caiva mamātmajau
analyzed: tau vihīnau mayā bālau tvayā ca eva mama ātmajau

original: 01,146.020c vinaśyetāṃ na saṃdeho matsyāv iva jalakṣaye
analyzed: vinaśyetām na saṃdehaḥ matsyau iva jala kṣaye
tritayam sarvathā api evam vinaśiṣyati asaṃśayam

original: 01,146.021c tvayā vihīnaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ māṃ parityaktum arhasi
analyzed: tvayā vihīnam tasmāt tvam mām parityaktum arhasi

original: 01,146.022a vyuṣṭir eṣā parā strīṇāṃ pūrvaṃ bhartuḥ parā gatiḥ
analyzed: vyuṣṭiḥ eṣā parā strīṇām pūrvam bhartuḥ parā gatiḥ

original: 01,146.022c na tu brāhmaṇa putrāṇāṃ viṣaye parivartitum
analyzed: na tu brāhmaṇa putrāṇām viṣaye parivartitum

original: 01,146.022d*1611_02 maraṇaṃ yāti yā bhartus tad dattajalapāyinī
analyzed: maraṇam yāti yā bhartuḥ tat datta jala pāyinī
bhartṛ pāda arpita manāḥ sā yāti girijā padam
girijāyāḥ sakhī bhūtvā modate naga kanyayā

original: 01,146.022d*1612_01 mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ bhrātā mitaṃ sutaḥ
analyzed: mitam dadāti hi pitā mitam bhrātā mitam sutaḥ

original: 01,146.022d*1612_02 amitasya hi dātāraṃ kā patiṃ nābhinandati
analyzed: amitasya hi dātāram kā patim na abhinandati

original: 01,146.023a parityaktaḥ sutaś cāyaṃ duhiteyaṃ tathā mayā
analyzed: parityaktaḥ sutaḥ ca ayam duhitā iyam tathā mayā

original: 01,146.023c bāndhavāś ca parityaktās tvadarthaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me
analyzed: bāndhavāḥ ca parityaktāḥ tvad artham jīvitam ca me

original: 01,146.024a yajñais tapobhir niyamair dānaiś ca vividhais tathā
analyzed: yajñaiḥ tapobhiḥ niyamaiḥ dānaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ tathā

original: 01,146.024c viśiṣyate striyā bhartur nityaṃ priyahite sthitiḥ
analyzed: viśiṣyate striyāḥ bhartuḥ nityam priya hite sthitiḥ
āśramāḥ ca agni saṃskārāḥ japa homa vratāni ca

original: 01,146.024d*1613_02 strīṇāṃ naite vidhātavyā vinā patim aninditam
analyzed: strīṇām na ete vidhātavyāḥ vinā patim aninditam

original: 01,146.024d*1613_03 kṣamā śaucam anāhāram etāvad viditaṃ striyāḥ
analyzed: kṣamā śaucam anāhāram etāvat viditam striyāḥ

original: 01,146.025a tad idaṃ yac cikīrṣāmi dharmyaṃ paramasaṃmatam
analyzed: tat idam yat cikīrṣāmi dharmyam parama saṃmatam

original: 01,146.025c iṣṭaṃ caiva hitaṃ caiva tava caiva kulasya ca
analyzed: iṣṭam ca eva hitam ca eva tava ca eva kulasya ca

original: 01,146.026a iṣṭāni cāpy apatyāni dravyāṇi suhṛdaḥ priyāḥ
analyzed: iṣṭāni ca api apatyāni dravyāṇi suhṛdaḥ priyāḥ
āpad dharma vimokṣāya bhāryā ca api satām matam

original: 01,146.026d*1614_01 āpadarthe dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanair api
analyzed: āpad arthe dhanam rakṣet dārān rakṣet dhanaiḥ api

original: 01,146.026d*1614_02 ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārair api dhanair api
analyzed: ātmānam satatam rakṣet dāraiḥ api dhanaiḥ api

original: 01,146.026d*1614_03 dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalārthaṃ hi bhāryā putro dhanaṃ gṛham
analyzed: dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa phala artham hi bhāryā putraḥ dhanam gṛham

original: 01,146.026d*1614_04 sarvam etad vidhātavyaṃ budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ
analyzed: sarvam etat vidhātavyam budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ

original: 01,146.027a ekato vā kulaṃ kṛtsnam ātmā vā kulavardhana
analyzed: ekatas vā kulam kṛtsnam ātmā vā kula vardhana

original: 01,146.027c na samaṃ sarvam eveti budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ
analyzed: na samam sarvam eva iti budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ

original: 01,146.027d*1615_01 ubhayoḥ ko 'dhiko vidvānn ātmā caivādhikaḥ kulāt
analyzed: ubhayoḥ kaḥ dhikaḥ vidvān ātmā ca eva adhikaḥ kulāt
ātmanaḥ vidyamāna tvāt bhuvanāni caturdaśa

original: 01,146.027d*1615_03 vidyante dvijaśārdūla ātmā rakṣyaḥ sadā tvayā
analyzed: vidyante dvija śārdūlaḥ ātmā rakṣyaḥ sadā tvayā

original: 01,146.027d*1615_04 ātmany avidyamāne cet tasya nāstīha kiṃ cana
analyzed: ātmani a vidyamāne ced tasya na asti iha kim cana

original: 01,146.027d*1615_05 etaj jagad idaṃ sarvam ātmanā na samaṃ kila
analyzed: etat jagat idam sarvam ātmanā na samam kila

original: 01,146.028a sa kuruṣva mayā kāryaṃ tārayātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: sa kuruṣva mayā kāryam tāraya ātmānam ātmanā

original: 01,146.028c anujānīhi mām ārya sutau me parirakṣa ca
analyzed: anujānīhi mām ārya sutau me parirakṣa ca

original: 01,146.028d*1616_01 kiṃ cānyac chṛṇu me nātha yad vakṣyāmi hitaṃ tava
analyzed: kim ca anyat śṛṇu me nātha yat vakṣyāmi hitam tava

original: 01,146.028d*1616_02 śrutvāvadhāryatāṃ tan me tatas te tad dhitaṃ kuru
analyzed: śrutvā avadhāryatām tat me tatas te tat hitam kuru

original: 01,146.029a avadhyāḥ striya ity āhur dharmajñā dharmaniścaye
analyzed: avadhyāḥ striyaḥ iti āhuḥ dharma jñāḥ dharma niścaye

original: 01,146.029c dharmajñān rākṣasān āhur na hanyāt sa ca mām api
analyzed: dharma jñān rākṣasān āhuḥ na hanyāt sa ca mām api

original: 01,146.030a niḥsaṃśayo vadhaḥ puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ saṃśayito vadhaḥ
analyzed: niḥsaṃśayaḥ vadhaḥ puṃsām strīṇām saṃśayitaḥ vadhaḥ

original: 01,146.030c ato mām eva dharmajña prasthāpayitum arhasi
analyzed: atas mām eva dharma jña prasthāpayitum arhasi

original: 01,146.031a bhuktaṃ priyāṇy avāptāni dharmaś ca carito mayā
analyzed: bhuktam priyāṇi avāptāni dharmaḥ ca caritaḥ mayā
tvad śuśrūṣaṇa saṃbhūtā kīrtiḥ ca api atulā mama

original: 01,146.031c tvatprasūtiḥ priyā prāptā na māṃ tapsyaty ajīvitam
analyzed: tvad prasūtiḥ priyā prāptā na mām tapsyati a jīvitam

original: 01,146.032a jātaputrā ca vṛddhā ca priyakāmā ca te sadā
analyzed: jāta putrā ca vṛddhā ca priya kāmā ca te sadā

original: 01,146.032c samīkṣyaitad ahaṃ sarvaṃ vyavasāyaṃ karomy ataḥ
analyzed: samīkṣya etat aham sarvam vyavasāyam karomi atas

original: 01,146.033a utsṛjyāpi ca mām ārya vetsyasy anyām api striyam
analyzed: utsṛjya api ca mām ārya vetsyasi anyām api striyam

original: 01,146.033b*1618_01 labhasva kulajāṃ kanyāṃ dharmas te bhavitā punaḥ
analyzed: labhasva kula jām kanyām dharmaḥ te bhavitā punar

original: 01,146.033b*1618_02 anāśramī na tiṣṭheta kṣaṇamātram api dvijaḥ
analyzed: anāśramī na tiṣṭheta kṣaṇa mātram api dvijaḥ

original: 01,146.033c tataḥ pratiṣṭhito dharmo bhaviṣyati punas tava
analyzed: tatas pratiṣṭhitaḥ dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati punar tava

original: 01,146.034a na cāpy adharmaḥ kalyāṇa bahupatnīkatā nṛṇām
analyzed: na ca api adharmaḥ kalyāṇa bahu patnīka tā nṛṇām

original: 01,146.034c strīṇām adharmaḥ sumahān bhartuḥ pūrvasya laṅghane
analyzed: strīṇām adharmaḥ su mahān bhartuḥ pūrvasya laṅghane

original: 01,146.035a etat sarvaṃ samīkṣya tvam ātmatyāgaṃ ca garhitam
analyzed: etat sarvam samīkṣya tvam ātmatyāgam ca garhitam

original: 01,146.035b*1619_01 kuru vākyaṃ mama vibho nānyathā mānasaṃ kuru
analyzed: kuru vākyam mama vibho na anyathā mānasam kuru

original: 01,146.035c ātmānaṃ tāraya mayā kulaṃ cemau ca dārakau
analyzed: ātmānam tāraya mayā kulam ca imau ca dārakau
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,146.036a evam uktas tayā bhartā tāṃ samāliṅgya bhārata
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tayā bhartā tām samāliṅgya bhārata
mumoca bāṣpam śanakais sa bhāryaḥ bhṛśa duḥkhitaḥ
tatas nantaram evā asya duhitā vaktum udyatā

original: 01,146.036d*1621_01 maivaṃ vada sukalyāṇi tiṣṭha gehe sumadhyame
analyzed: mā evam vada su kalyāṇi tiṣṭha gehe sumadhyame

original: 01,146.036d*1621_02 na svāṃ bhāryāṃ tyajet prājñaḥ putrān vāpi kadā cana
analyzed: na svām bhāryām tyajet prājñaḥ putrān vā api kadā cana

original: 01,146.036d*1621_03 viśeṣataḥ striyaṃ rakṣet puruṣo buddhimān iha
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ striyam rakṣet puruṣaḥ buddhimān iha

original: 01,146.036d*1621_04 tyaktvā tu puruṣo jīven na hātavyān imān sadā
analyzed: tyaktvā tu puruṣaḥ jīvet na hātavyān imān sadā

original: 01,146.036d*1621_05 na vetti dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ mokṣaṃ ca tattvataḥ
analyzed: na vetti dharmam artham ca kāmam mokṣam ca tattvataḥ
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,147.001a tayor duḥkhitayor vākyam atimātraṃ niśamya tat
analyzed: tayoḥ duḥkhitayoḥ vākyam atimātram niśamya tat
bhṛśam duḥkha parīta aṅgī kanyā tau abhyabhāṣata
kim idam bhṛśa duḥkha ārtau roravīthaḥ anātha vat

original: 01,147.002c mamāpi śrūyatāṃ kiṃ cic chrutvā ca kriyatāṃ kṣamam
analyzed: mama api śrūyatām kim cit śrutvā ca kriyatām kṣamam
dharmataḥ ham parityājyāḥ yuvayoḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 01,147.003c tyaktavyāṃ māṃ parityajya trātaṃ sarvaṃ mayaikayā
analyzed: tyaktavyām mām parityajya trātam sarvam mayā ekayā

original: 01,147.004a ity artham iṣyate 'patyaṃ tārayiṣyati mām iti
analyzed: iti artham iṣyate patyam tārayiṣyati mām iti

original: 01,147.004c tasminn upasthite kāle tarataṃ plavavan mayā
analyzed: tasmin upasthite kāle taratam plava vat mayā

original: 01,147.005a iha vā tārayed durgād uta vā pretya tārayet
analyzed: iha vā tārayet durgāt uta vā pretya tārayet

original: 01,147.005c sarvathā tārayet putraḥ putra ity ucyate budhaiḥ
analyzed: sarvathā tārayet putraḥ putraḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ

original: 01,147.005d*1622_01 punnāmno narakāt trāṇāt tanayaḥ putra ucyate
01,147.006a ākāṅkṣante ca dauhitrān api nityaṃ pitāmahāḥ
analyzed: ākāṅkṣante ca dauhitrān api nityam pitāmahāḥ

original: 01,147.006c tān svayaṃ vai paritrāsye rakṣantī jīvitaṃ pituḥ
analyzed: tān svayam vai paritrāsye rakṣantī jīvitam pituḥ

original: 01,147.007a bhrātā ca mama bālo 'yaṃ gate lokam amuṃ tvayi
analyzed: bhrātā ca mama bālaḥ yam gate lokam amum tvayi
acireṇa eva kālena vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ

original: 01,147.008a tāte 'pi hi gate svargaṃ vinaṣṭe ca mamānuje
analyzed: tāte hi gate svargam vinaṣṭe ca mama anuje

original: 01,147.008c piṇḍaḥ pitṝṇāṃ vyucchidyet tat teṣām apriyaṃ bhavet
analyzed: piṇḍaḥ pitṝṇām vyucchidyet tat teṣām apriyam bhavet

original: 01,147.009a pitrā tyaktā tathā mātrā bhrātrā cāham asaṃśayam
analyzed: pitrā tyaktā tathā mātrā bhrātrā ca aham asaṃśayam
duḥkhāt duḥkhataram prāpya mriyeyam a tathā ucitā

original: 01,147.010a tvayi tv aroge nirmukte mātā bhrātā ca me śiśuḥ
analyzed: tvayi tu aroge nirmukte mātā bhrātā ca me śiśuḥ

original: 01,147.010c saṃtānaś caiva piṇḍaś ca pratiṣṭhāsyaty asaṃśayam
analyzed: saṃtānaḥ ca eva piṇḍaḥ ca pratiṣṭhāsyati asaṃśayam

original: 01,147.011a ātmā putraḥ sakhā bhāryā kṛcchraṃ tu duhitā kila
analyzed: ātmā putraḥ sakhā bhāryā kṛcchram tu duhitā kila

original: 01,147.011c sa kṛcchrān mocayātmānaṃ māṃ ca dharmeṇa yojaya
analyzed: sa kṛcchrāt mocaya ātmānam mām ca dharmeṇa yojaya
anāthā kṛpaṇā bālā yatra kvacana gāminī

original: 01,147.012c bhaviṣyāmi tvayā tāta vihīnā kṛpaṇā bata
analyzed: bhaviṣyāmi tvayā tāta vihīnā kṛpaṇā bata
athavā aham kariṣyāmi kulasya asya vimokṣaṇam
phala saṃsthā bhaviṣyāmi kṛtvā karma su duṣkaram

original: 01,147.014a athavā yāsyase tatra tyaktvā māṃ dvijasattama
analyzed: athavā yāsyase tatra tyaktvā mām dvijasattama

original: 01,147.014c pīḍitāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi tad avekṣasva mām api
analyzed: pīḍitā aham bhaviṣyāmi tat avekṣasva mām api

original: 01,147.015a tad asmadarthaṃ dharmārthaṃ prasavārthaṃ ca sattama
analyzed: tat asmad artham dharma artham prasava artham ca sattama

original: 01,147.015c ātmānaṃ parirakṣasva tyaktavyāṃ māṃ ca saṃtyaja
analyzed: ātmānam parirakṣasva tyaktavyām mām ca saṃtyaja
avaśya karaṇīye rthe mā tvām tyagāt ayam

original: 01,147.016c tvayā dattena toyena bhaviṣyati hitaṃ ca me
analyzed: tvayā dattena toyena bhaviṣyati hitam ca me

original: 01,147.017a kiṃ nv ataḥ paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad vayaṃ svargate tvayi
analyzed: kim nu atas paramam duḥkham yat vayam svargate tvayi
yācamānāḥ parāt annam paridhāvemahi śva vat

original: 01,147.018a tvayi tv aroge nirmukte kleśād asmāt sabāndhave
analyzed: tvayi tu aroge nirmukte kleśāt asmāt sa bāndhave
amṛte vasatī loke bhaviṣyāmi sukha anvitā

original: 01,147.018d*1623_01 itaḥ pradāne devāś ca pitaraś ceti naḥ śrutam
analyzed: itas pradāne devāḥ ca pitaraḥ ca iti naḥ śrutam

original: 01,147.018d*1624_01 ity etad ubhayaṃ tāta niśāmya tava yad dhitam
analyzed: iti etat ubhayam tāta niśāmya tava yat hitam

original: 01,147.018d*1624_02 tad vyavasya tathāmbāyā hitaṃ svasya sutasya ca
analyzed: tat vyavasya tathā ambāyāḥ hitam svasya sutasya ca
mātā pitroḥ punar putrāḥ bhavitāraḥ guṇa anvitāḥ

original: 01,147.018d*1624_04 na tu putrasya pitarau punar jātu bhaviṣyataḥ
analyzed: na tu putrasya pitarau punar jātu bhaviṣyataḥ
evam bahuvidham tasyāḥ niśamya paridevitam

original: 01,147.019c pitā mātā ca sā caiva kanyā prarurudus trayaḥ
analyzed: pitā mātā ca sā ca eva kanyā praruruduḥ trayaḥ

original: 01,147.020a tataḥ praruditān sarvān niśamyātha sutas tayoḥ
analyzed: tatas praruditān sarvān niśamya atha sutaḥ tayoḥ
utphulla nayanaḥ bālaḥ kalam avyaktam abravīt

original: 01,147.021a mā rodīs tāta mā mātar mā svasas tvam iti bruvan
analyzed: mā rodīḥ tāta mā mātar mā svasaḥ tvam iti bruvan

original: 01,147.021c prahasann iva sarvāṃs tān ekaikaṃ so 'pasarpati
analyzed: prahasan iva sarvān tān ekaikam saḥ u pasarpati

original: 01,147.022a tataḥ sa tṛṇam ādāya prahṛṣṭaḥ punar abravīt
analyzed: tatas sa tṛṇam ādāya prahṛṣṭaḥ punar abravīt
anena tam haniṣyāmi rākṣasam puruṣādakam

original: 01,147.023a tathāpi teṣāṃ duḥkhena parītānāṃ niśamya tat
analyzed: tathā api teṣām duḥkhena parītānām niśamya tat

original: 01,147.023c bālasya vākyam avyaktaṃ harṣaḥ samabhavan mahān
analyzed: bālasya vākyam avyaktam harṣaḥ samabhavat mahān

original: 01,147.024a ayaṃ kāla iti jñātvā kuntī samupasṛtya tān
analyzed: ayam kālaḥ iti jñātvā kuntī samupasṛtya tān
gatāsūn amṛtena iva jīvayantī idam abravīt
kuntī uvāca

original: 01,148.001a kutomūlam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ
analyzed: kutomūlam idam duḥkham jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ
viditvā apakarṣeyam śakyam ced apakarṣitum
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: 01,148.002a upapannaṃ satām etad yad bravīṣi tapodhane
analyzed: upapannam satām etat yat bravīṣi tapodhane

original: 01,148.002c na tu duḥkham idaṃ śakyaṃ mānuṣeṇa vyapohitum
analyzed: na tu duḥkham idam śakyam mānuṣeṇa vyapohitum

original: 01,148.002d*1625_01 tathāpi tattvam ākhyāsye etad duḥkhasya saṃbhavam
analyzed: tathā api tattvam ākhyāsye etat duḥkhasya saṃbhavam

original: 01,148.002d*1625_02 śakyaṃ vā yadi vāśakyaṃ śṛṇu bhadre yathātatham
analyzed: śakyam vā yadi vā aśakyam śṛṇu bhadre yathātatham
samīpe nagarasya asya bakaḥ vasati rākṣasaḥ
itas gavyūti mātre sti yamunā gahvare guhā

original: 01,148.003b*1626_02 tasyāṃ ghoraḥ sa vasati jighāṃsuḥ puruṣādakaḥ
analyzed: tasyām ghoraḥ sa vasati jighāṃsuḥ puruṣādakaḥ

original: 01,148.003b*1626_03 bako nāma sa nāmnā vai duṣṭātmā rākṣasādhamaḥ
analyzed: bakaḥ nāma sa nāmnā vai duṣṭa ātmā rākṣasa adhamaḥ
īśaḥ janapadasya asya purasya ca mahā balaḥ
pralambakaḥ kāmarūpī rākṣasaḥ vai mahā balaḥ
tena upasṛṣṭā nagarī varṣam adya trayodaśam
puṣṭaḥ mānuṣa māṃsena durbuddhiḥ puruṣādakaḥ

original: 01,148.004c rakṣaty asurarāṇ nityam imaṃ janapadaṃ balī
analyzed: rakṣati asura rāj nityam imam janapadam balī
nagaram ca eva deśam ca rakṣaḥ bala samanvitaḥ

original: 01,148.005c tatkṛte paracakrāc ca bhūtebhyaś ca na no bhayam
analyzed: tad kṛte para cakrāt ca bhūtebhyaḥ ca na naḥ bhayam
puruṣādakena raudreṇa bhakṣyamāṇāḥ durātmanā
anāthā nagarī nātham trātāram na adhigacchati

original: 01,148.005d@091_0003 guhāyāṃ vasatas tatra bādhate satataṃ janam
analyzed: guhāyām vasataḥ tatra bādhate satatam janam

original: 01,148.005d@091_0004 striyo bālāṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca yūnaś cāpi durātmavān
analyzed: striyaḥ bālān ca vṛddhān ca yūnaḥ ca api durātmavān

original: 01,148.005d@091_0005 atra mantraiś ca homaiś ca bhojanaiś ca sa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: atra mantraiḥ ca homaiḥ ca bhojanaiḥ ca sa rākṣasaḥ

original: 01,148.005d@091_0006 īḍito dvijamukhyaiś ca pūjitaś ca durātmavān
analyzed: īḍitaḥ dvijamukhyaiḥ ca pūjitaḥ ca durātmavān

original: 01,148.005d@091_0007 yadā ca sakalān evaṃ prasūdayati rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: yadā ca sakalān evam prasūdayati rākṣasaḥ
atha enam brāhmaṇāḥ sarve samaye samayojayan

original: 01,148.005d@091_0009 māsmān kāmād vadhī rakṣo dāsyāmas te sadā vayam
analyzed: mā asmān kāmāt vadhī rakṣaḥ dāsyāmaḥ te sadā vayam
paryāyeṇa yathākāmam iha māṃsodanam prabho
annam māṃsa samāyuktam tila cūrṇa samanvitam

original: 01,148.005d@091_0012 sarpiṣā ca samāyukta vyañjanaiś ca vibhūṣitam
analyzed: sarpiṣā ca vyañjanaiḥ ca vibhūṣitam
srajaḥ citrāḥ tilān piṇḍān lāja apūpa surā āsavān
śṛta a śṛtān pāna kumbhān sthūla māṃsam śṛta a śṛtam

original: 01,148.005d@091_0015 sarpiḥkumbhāṃś ca vividhān anyāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
analyzed: sarpiḥ kumbhān ca vividhān anyān ca vividhān bahūn
adya siddhaiḥ samāyuktaiḥ tila cūrṇaiḥ samākulān

original: 01,148.005d@091_0017 kulāt kulāc ca puruṣaṃ balīvardau ca kālakau
analyzed: kulāt kulāt ca puruṣam balīvardau ca kālakau
prāpsyasi tvam asaṃkruddhaḥ rakṣaḥ bhāgam prakalpitam

original: 01,148.005d@091_0019 tiṣṭheha samaye 'smākam ity ayācanta taṃ dvijāḥ
analyzed: tiṣṭha iha samaye smākam iti ayācanta tam dvijāḥ

original: 01,148.005d@091_0020 bāḍham ity eva tad rakṣas tadvacaḥ pratyagṛhṇata
analyzed: bāḍham iti eva tat rakṣaḥ tat vacaḥ pratyagṛhṇata

original: 01,148.005d@091_0021 paracakrān na bibhyaṃś ca rakṣaṇaṃ sa karoti ca
analyzed: para cakrāt na bibhyan ca rakṣaṇam sa karoti ca

original: 01,148.005d@091_0022 tasmin bhāge vinirdiṣṭe cāsthitaḥ samayaṃ balī
analyzed: tasmin bhāge vinirdiṣṭe ca āsthitaḥ samayam balī
vetanam tasya vihitam śālivāhasya bhojanam

original: 01,148.006c mahiṣau puruṣaś caiko yas tad ādāya gacchati
analyzed: mahiṣau puruṣaḥ ca ekaḥ yaḥ tat ādāya gacchati

original: 01,148.007a ekaikaś caiva puruṣas tat prayacchati bhojanam
analyzed: ekaikaḥ ca eva puruṣaḥ tat prayacchati bhojanam

original: 01,148.007c sa vāro bahubhir varṣair bhavaty asutaro naraiḥ
analyzed: sa vāraḥ bahubhiḥ varṣaiḥ bhavati asutaraḥ naraiḥ

original: 01,148.008a tadvimokṣāya ye cāpi yatante puruṣāḥ kva cit
analyzed: tad vimokṣāya ye ca api yatante puruṣāḥ kva cit

original: 01,148.008c saputradārāṃs tān hatvā tad rakṣo bhakṣayaty uta
analyzed: sa putra dārān tān hatvā tat rakṣaḥ bhakṣayati uta
vetrakīyagṛhe rājā na ayam nayam iha āsthitaḥ

original: 01,148.009b*1628_01 upāyaṃ taṃ na kurute yatnād api sa mandadhīḥ
analyzed: upāyam tam na kurute yatnāt api sa manda dhīḥ

original: 01,148.009c anāmayaṃ janasyāsya yena syād adya śāśvatam
analyzed: anāmayam janasya asya yena syāt adya śāśvatam

original: 01,148.010a etadarhā vayaṃ nūnaṃ vasāmo durbalasya ye
analyzed: etad arhāḥ vayam nūnam vasāmaḥ durbalasya ye
viṣaye nityam udvignāḥ ku rājānam upāśritāḥ
purātanasya vāsasya gṛha kṣetra ādikasya ca
parityāgam na icchamānāḥ vasāmaḥ nagare tatas
eka cakrā api vasatiḥ sva vācaḥ duṣparityajaḥ
dīyamāne nara kare satatam baka rākṣase

original: 01,148.011a brāhmaṇāḥ kasya vaktavyāḥ kasya vā chandacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ kasya vaktavyāḥ kasya vā chanda cāriṇaḥ

original: 01,148.011c guṇair ete hi vāsyante kāmagāḥ pakṣiṇo yathā
analyzed: guṇaiḥ ete hi vāsyante kāma gāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ yathā

original: 01,148.012a rājānaṃ prathamaṃ vindet tato bhāryāṃ tato dhanam
analyzed: rājānam prathamam vindet tatas bhāryām tatas dhanam

original: 01,148.012b*1630_01 rājany asati loke 'smin kuto bhāryā kuto dhanam
analyzed: rājani asati loke smin kutas bhāryā kutas dhanam

original: 01,148.012c trayasya saṃcaye cāsya jñātīn putrāṃś ca dhārayet
analyzed: trayasya saṃcaye ca asya jñātīn putrān ca dhārayet

original: 01,148.013a viparītaṃ mayā cedaṃ trayaṃ sarvam upārjitam
analyzed: viparītam mayā ca idam trayam sarvam upārjitam

original: 01,148.013c ta imām āpadaṃ prāpya bhṛśaṃ tapsyāmahe vayam
analyzed: te imām āpadam prāpya bhṛśam tapsyāmahe vayam
saḥ yam asmān anuprāptaḥ vāraḥ kula vināśanaḥ

original: 01,148.014c bhojanaṃ puruṣaś caikaḥ pradeyaṃ vetanaṃ mayā
analyzed: bhojanam puruṣaḥ ca ekaḥ pradeyam vetanam mayā

original: 01,148.015a na ca me vidyate vittaṃ saṃkretuṃ puruṣaṃ kva cit
analyzed: na ca me vidyate vittam saṃkretum puruṣam kva cit

original: 01,148.015c suhṛjjanaṃ pradātuṃ ca na śakṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
analyzed: suhṛd janam pradātum ca na śakṣyāmi katham cana

original: 01,148.015e gatiṃ cāpi na paśyāmi tasmān mokṣāya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: gatim ca api na paśyāmi tasmāt mokṣāya rakṣasaḥ

original: 01,148.016a so 'haṃ duḥkhārṇave magno mahaty asutare bhṛśam
analyzed: saḥ ham duḥkha arṇave magnaḥ mahati asutare bhṛśam
saha eva etaiḥ gamiṣyāmi bāndhavaiḥ adya rākṣasam

original: 01,148.016e tato naḥ sahitan kṣudraḥ sarvān evopabhokṣyati
analyzed: tatas naḥ sahitan kṣudraḥ sarvān eva upabhokṣyati
duḥkha mūlam idam bhadre mayā uktam praśnataḥ naghe
kuntī uvāca

original: 01,149.001a na viṣādas tvayā kāryo bhayād asmāt kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na viṣādaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ bhayāt asmāt katham cana
upāyaḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ tra tasmāt mokṣāya rakṣasaḥ

original: 01,149.001d*1632_01 naiva svayaṃ saputrasya gamanaṃ tatra rocaye
analyzed: na eva svayam sa putrasya gamanam tatra rocaye

original: 01,149.002a ekas tava suto bālaḥ kanyā caikā tapasvinī
analyzed: ekaḥ tava sutaḥ bālaḥ kanyā ca ekā tapasvinī

original: 01,149.002c na te tayos tathā patnyā gamanaṃ tatra rocaye
analyzed: na te tayoḥ tathā patnyāḥ gamanam tatra rocaye

original: 01,149.003a mama pañca sutā brahmaṃs teṣām eko gamiṣyati
analyzed: mama pañca sutāḥ brahman teṣām ekaḥ gamiṣyati

original: 01,149.003c tvadarthaṃ balim ādāya tasya pāpasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: tvad artham balim ādāya tasya pāpasya rakṣasaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: 01,149.004a nāham etat kariṣyāmi jīvitārthī kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na aham etat kariṣyāmi jīvita arthī katham cana
brāhmaṇasya atitheḥ ca eva sva arthe prāṇaiḥ viyojanam

original: 01,149.005a na tv etad akulīnāsu nādharmiṣṭhāsu vidyate
analyzed: na tu etat akulīnāsu na adharmiṣṭhāsu vidyate

original: 01,149.005c yad brāhmaṇārthe visṛjed ātmānam api cātmajam
analyzed: yat brāhmaṇa arthe visṛjet ātmānam api ca ātmajam

original: 01,149.006a ātmanas tu mayā śreyo boddhavyam iti rocaye
analyzed: ātmanaḥ tu mayā śreyaḥ boddhavyam iti rocaye
brahma vadhyā ātmavadhyā vā śreyaḥ ātmavadhaḥ mama

original: 01,149.006d*1633_01 brahmahatyā paraṃ pāpaṃ śreyān ātmavadho mama
analyzed: brahmahatyā param pāpam śreyān ātma vadhaḥ mama

original: 01,149.007a brahmavadhyā paraṃ pāpaṃ niṣkṛtir nātra vidyate
analyzed: brahma vadhyā param pāpam niṣkṛtiḥ na atra vidyate

original: 01,149.007b*1634_01 prayoktā cānumantā ca hantā ceti trayaḥ samāḥ
analyzed: prayoktā ca anumantā ca hantā ca iti trayaḥ samāḥ
abuddhi pūrvam kṛtvā api śreyaḥ ātmavadhaḥ mama

original: 01,149.008a na tv ahaṃ vadham ākāṅkṣe svayam evātmanaḥ śubhe
analyzed: na tu aham vadham ākāṅkṣe svayam eva ātmanaḥ śubhe

original: 01,149.008c paraiḥ kṛte vadhe pāpaṃ na kiṃ cin mayi vidyate
analyzed: paraiḥ kṛte vadhe pāpam na kim cit mayi vidyate
abhisaṃdhi kṛte tasmin brāhmaṇasya vadhe mayā

original: 01,149.009c niṣkṛtiṃ na prapaśyāmi nṛśaṃsaṃ kṣudram eva ca
analyzed: niṣkṛtim na prapaśyāmi nṛśaṃsam kṣudram eva ca
āgatasya gṛhe tyāgaḥ tathā eva śaraṇa arthinaḥ

original: 01,149.010c yācamānasya ca vadho nṛśaṃsaṃ paramaṃ matam
analyzed: yācamānasya ca vadhaḥ nṛśaṃsam paramam matam

original: 01,149.011a kuryān na ninditaṃ karma na nṛśaṃsaṃ kadā cana
analyzed: kuryāt na ninditam karma na nṛśaṃsam kadā cana
iti pūrve mahātmānaḥ āpad dharma vidaḥ viduḥ

original: 01,149.012a śreyāṃs tu sahadārasya vināśo 'dya mama svayam
analyzed: śreyān tu sahadārasya vināśaḥ mama svayam

original: 01,149.012c brāhmaṇasya vadhaṃ nāham anumaṃsye kathaṃ cana
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya vadham na aham anumaṃsye katham cana
kuntī uvāca

original: 01,149.013a mamāpy eṣā matir brahman viprā rakṣyā iti sthirā
analyzed: mama api eṣā matiḥ brahman viprāḥ rakṣyāḥ iti sthirā

original: 01,149.013c na cāpy aniṣṭaḥ putro me yadi putraśataṃ bhavet
analyzed: na ca api aniṣṭaḥ putraḥ me yadi putra śatam bhavet

original: 01,149.014a na cāsau rākṣasaḥ śakto mama putravināśane
analyzed: na ca asau rākṣasaḥ śaktaḥ mama putra vināśane

original: 01,149.014c vīryavān mantrasiddhaś ca tejasvī ca suto mama
analyzed: vīryavān mantra siddhaḥ ca tejasvī ca sutaḥ mama

original: 01,149.015a rākṣasāya ca tat sarvaṃ prāpayiṣyati bhojanam
analyzed: rākṣasāya ca tat sarvam prāpayiṣyati bhojanam

original: 01,149.015c mokṣayiṣyati cātmānam iti me niścitā matiḥ
analyzed: mokṣayiṣyati ca ātmānam iti me niścitā matiḥ

original: 01,149.016a samāgatāś ca vīreṇa dṛṣṭapūrvāś ca rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: samāgatāḥ ca vīreṇa dṛṣṭa pūrvāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ
balavantaḥ mahā kāyāḥ nihatāḥ ca api anekaśas

original: 01,149.017a na tv idaṃ keṣu cid brahman vyāhartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na tu idam keṣu cit brahman vyāhartavyam katham cana

original: 01,149.017c vidyārthino hi me putrān viprakuryuḥ kutūhalāt
analyzed: vidyā arthinaḥ hi me putrān viprakuryuḥ kutūhalāt

original: 01,149.018a guruṇā cānanujñāto grāhayed yaṃ suto mama
analyzed: guruṇā ca ananujñātaḥ grāhayet yam sutaḥ mama

original: 01,149.018c na sa kuryāt tayā kāryaṃ vidyayeti satāṃ matam
analyzed: na sa kuryāt tayā kāryam vidyayā iti satām matam
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,149.019a evam uktas tu pṛthayā sa vipro bhāryayā saha
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu pṛthayā sa vipraḥ bhāryayā saha

original: 01,149.019c hṛṣṭaḥ saṃpūjayām āsa tad vākyam amṛtopamam
analyzed: hṛṣṭaḥ saṃpūjayām āsa tat vākyam amṛta upamam

original: 01,149.020a tataḥ kuntī ca vipraś ca sahitāv anilātmajam
analyzed: tatas kuntī ca vipraḥ ca sahitau anilātmajam

original: 01,149.020c tam abrūtāṃ kuruṣveti sa tathety abravīc ca tau
analyzed: tam abrūtām kuruṣva iti sa tathā iti abravīt ca tau
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,150.001a kariṣya iti bhīmena pratijñāte tu bhārata
analyzed: kariṣye iti bhīmena pratijñāte tu bhārata

original: 01,150.001c ājagmus te tataḥ sarve bhaikṣam ādāya pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: ājagmuḥ te tatas sarve bhaikṣam ādāya pāṇḍavāḥ
bhīmasenam tatas dṛṣṭvā āpūrṇa vadanam tadā

original: 01,150.001d*1635_02 bubodha dharmarājas tu hṛṣitaṃ bhīmam acyutam
