analyzed: tatas pratinivṛttaḥ sa tayā vadhvā saha anagha
kalmāṣapādam āsīnam dadarśa vijane vane

original: 01,167.017a sa tu dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ rājā kruddha utthāya bhārata
analyzed: sa tu dṛṣṭvā eva tam rājā kruddhaḥ utthāya bhārata

original: 01,167.017c āviṣṭo rakṣasogreṇa iyeṣāttuṃ tataḥ sma tam
analyzed: āviṣṭaḥ rakṣasā ugreṇa iyeṣa attum tatas sma tam

original: 01,167.018a adṛśyantī tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā krūrakarmāṇam agrataḥ
analyzed: adṛśyantī tu tam dṛṣṭvā krūra karmāṇam agratas
bhaya saṃvignayā vācā vasiṣṭham idam abravīt

original: 01,167.019a asau mṛtyur ivogreṇa daṇḍena bhagavann itaḥ
analyzed: asau mṛtyuḥ iva ugreṇa daṇḍena bhagavan itas
pragṛhītena kāṣṭhena rākṣasaḥ bhyeti bhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 01,167.020a taṃ nivārayituṃ śakto nānyo 'sti bhuvi kaś cana
analyzed: tam nivārayitum śaktaḥ na anyaḥ sti bhuvi kaḥ cana
tvat ṛte dya mahābhāga sarva veda vidām vara

original: 01,167.021a trāhi māṃ bhagavan pāpād asmād dāruṇadarśanāt
analyzed: trāhi mām bhagavan pāpāt asmāt dāruṇa darśanāt

original: 01,167.021c rakṣo attum iha hy āvāṃ nūnam etac cikīrṣati
analyzed: rakṣaḥ attum iha hi āvām nūnam etat cikīrṣati
vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca

original: 01,168.001a mā bhaiḥ putri na bhetavyaṃ rakṣasas te kathaṃ cana
analyzed: mā bhaiḥ putri na bhetavyam rakṣasaḥ te katham cana

original: 01,168.001c naitad rakṣo bhayaṃ yasmāt paśyasi tvam upasthitam
analyzed: na etat rakṣaḥ bhayam yasmāt paśyasi tvam upasthitam
rājā kalmāṣapādaḥ yam vīryavān prathitaḥ bhuvi
saḥ eṣaḥ smin vana uddeśe nivasati ati bhīṣaṇaḥ
gandharvaḥ uvāca

original: 01,168.003a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
vārayām āsa tejasvī huṃkareṇa eva bhārata

original: 01,168.004a mantrapūtena ca punaḥ sa tam abhyukṣya vāriṇā
analyzed: mantra pūtena ca punar sa tam abhyukṣya vāriṇā

original: 01,168.004c mokṣayām āsa vai ghorād rākṣasād rājasattamam
analyzed: mokṣayām āsa vai ghorāt rākṣasāt rāja sattamam

original: 01,168.005a sa hi dvādaśa varṣāṇi vasiṣṭhasyaiva tejasā
analyzed: sa hi dvādaśa varṣāṇi vasiṣṭhasya eva tejasā
grastaḥ āsīt gṛheṇa iva parva kāle divākaraḥ

original: 01,168.006a rakṣasā vipramukto 'tha sa nṛpas tad vanaṃ mahat
analyzed: rakṣasā vipramuktaḥ sa nṛpaḥ tat vanam mahat

original: 01,168.006c tejasā rañjayām āsa saṃdhyābhram iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: tejasā rañjayām āsa saṃdhyā abhram iva bhāskaraḥ
pratilabhya tatas saṃjñām abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
uvāca nṛpatiḥ kāle vasiṣṭham ṛṣi sattamam
saudāsaḥ ham mahābhāga yājyaḥ te dvijasattama

original: 01,168.008c asmin kāle yad iṣṭaṃ te brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
analyzed: asmin kāle yat iṣṭam te brūhi kim karavāṇi te
vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca

original: 01,168.009a vṛttam etad yathākālaṃ gaccha rājyaṃ praśādhi tat
analyzed: vṛttam etat yathākālam gaccha rājyam praśādhi tat

original: 01,168.009c brāhmaṇāṃś ca manuṣyendra māvamaṃsthāḥ kadā cana
analyzed: brāhmaṇān ca manuṣya indra mā avamaṃsthāḥ kadā cana
rājā uvāca

original: 01,168.010a nāvamaṃsyāmy ahaṃ brahman kadā cid brāhmaṇarṣabhān
analyzed: na avamaṃsyāmi aham brahman kadā cit brāhmaṇa ṛṣabhān

original: 01,168.010c tvan nideśe sthitaḥ śaśvat pujayiṣyāmy ahaṃ dvijān
analyzed: tvat nideśe sthitaḥ śaśvat pujayiṣyāmi aham dvijān

original: 01,168.011a ikṣvākūṇāṃ tu yenāham anṛṇaḥ syāṃ dvijottama
analyzed: ikṣvākūṇām tu yena aham anṛṇaḥ syām dvijottama

original: 01,168.011c tat tvattaḥ prāptum icchāmi varaṃ vedavidāṃ vara
analyzed: tat tvattaḥ prāptum icchāmi varam veda vidām vara
apatyāya īpsitām mahyam mahiṣīm gantum arhasi
śīla rūpa guṇa upetām ikṣvāku kula vṛddhaye
gandharvaḥ uvāca

original: 01,168.013a dadānīty eva taṃ tatra rājānaṃ pratyuvāca ha
analyzed: dadāni iti eva tam tatra rājānam pratyuvāca ha
vasiṣṭhaḥ parama iṣvāsam satya saṃdhaḥ dvijottamaḥ
tatas pratiyayau kāle vasiṣṭha sahitaḥ nagha
khyātam pura varam lokeṣu ayodhyām manuja īśvaraḥ

original: 01,168.015a taṃ prajāḥ pratimodantyaḥ sarvāḥ pratyudyayus tadā
analyzed: tam prajāḥ pratimodantyaḥ sarvāḥ pratyudyayuḥ tadā
vipāpmānam mahātmānam divaukasaḥ iva īśvaram
acirāt sa manuṣya indraḥ nagarīm puṇya karmaṇām
viveśa sahitaḥ tena vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā

original: 01,168.017a dadṛśus taṃ tato rājann ayodhyāvāsino janāḥ
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ tam tatas rājan ayodhyā vāsinaḥ janāḥ
puṣyeṇa sahitam kāle divākaram iva uditam

original: 01,168.018a sa hi tāṃ pūrayām āsa lakṣmyā lakṣmīvatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: sa hi tām pūrayām āsa lakṣmyā lakṣmīvatām varaḥ
ayodhyām vyoma śītāṃśuḥ śarad kāle iva uditaḥ
saṃsikta mṛṣṭa panthānam patākā ucchraya bhūṣitam

original: 01,168.019c manaḥ prahlādayām āsā tasya tat puram uttamam
analyzed: manaḥ prahlādayām āsā tasya tat puram uttamam
tuṣṭa puṣṭa jana ākīrṇā sā purī kuru nandana
aśobhata tadā tena śakreṇa iva amarāvatī

original: 01,168.021a tataḥ praviṣṭe rājendre tasmin rājani tāṃ purīm
analyzed: tatas praviṣṭe rāja indre tasmin rājani tām purīm
tasya rājñaḥ jñayā devī vasiṣṭham upacakrame

original: 01,168.022a ṛtāv atha maharṣiḥ sa saṃbabhūva tayā saha
analyzed: ṛtau atha mahā ṛṣiḥ sa saṃbabhūva tayā saha

original: 01,168.022c devyā divyena vidhinā vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhabhāg ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: devyāḥ divyena vidhinā vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha bhāj ṛṣiḥ

original: 01,168.023a atha tasyāṃ samutpanne garbhe sa munisattamaḥ
analyzed: atha tasyām samutpanne garbhe sa muni sattamaḥ
rājñā abhivāditaḥ tena jagāma punar āśramam

original: 01,168.024a dīrghakāladhṛtaṃ garbhaṃ suṣāva na tu taṃ yadā
analyzed: dīrgha kāla dhṛtam garbham suṣāva na tu tam yadā

original: 01,168.024c sātha devy aśmanā kukṣiṃ nirbibheda tadā svakam
analyzed: sā atha devī aśmanā kukṣim nirbibheda tadā svakam

original: 01,168.025a dvādaśe 'tha tato varṣe sa jajñe manujarṣabha
analyzed: dvādaśe tha tatas varṣe sa jajñe manuja ṛṣabha

original: 01,168.025c aśmako nāma rājarṣiḥ potanaṃ yo nyaveśayat
analyzed: aśmakaḥ nāma rājarṣiḥ potanam yaḥ nyaveśayat
gandharvaḥ uvāca
āśrama sthā tatas putram adṛśyantī vyajāyata

original: 01,169.001c śakteḥ kulakaraṃ rājan dvitīyam iva śaktinam
analyzed: śakteḥ kula karam rājan dvitīyam iva śaktinam
jātakarma ādikāḥ tasya kriyāḥ sa muni puṃgavaḥ
pautrasya bharata śreṣṭha cakāra bhagavān svayam

original: 01,169.003a parāsuś ca yatas tena vasiṣṭhaḥ sthāpitas tadā
analyzed: parāsuḥ ca yatas tena vasiṣṭhaḥ sthāpitaḥ tadā

original: 01,169.003c garbhasthena tato loke parāśara iti smṛtaḥ
analyzed: garbha sthena tatas loke parāśaraḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: 01,169.004a amanyata sa dharmātmā vasiṣṭhaṃ pitaraṃ tadā
analyzed: amanyata sa dharma ātmā vasiṣṭham pitaram tadā
janma prabhṛti tasmin ca pitari iva vyavartata

original: 01,169.005a sa tāta iti viprarṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: sa tāta iti viprarṣim vasiṣṭham pratyabhāṣata
mātuḥ samakṣam kaunteya adṛśyantyāḥ paraṃtapa

original: 01,169.006a tāteti paripūrṇārthaṃ tasya tan madhuraṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: tāta iti paripūrṇa artham tasya tat madhuram vacaḥ

original: 01,169.006c adṛśyanty aśrupūrṇākṣī śṛṇvantī tam uvāca ha
analyzed: adṛśyantī aśru pūrṇa akṣī śṛṇvantī tam uvāca ha

original: 01,169.007a mā tāta tāta tāteti na te tāto mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: mā tāta tāta tāta iti na te tātaḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 01,169.007c rakṣasā bhakṣitas tāta tava tāto vanāntare
analyzed: rakṣasā bhakṣitaḥ tāta tava tātaḥ vana antare

original: 01,169.008a manyase yaṃ tu tāteti naiṣa tātas tavānagha
analyzed: manyase yam tu tāta iti na eṣa tātaḥ tava anagha

original: 01,169.008c āryas tv eṣa pitā tasya pitus tava mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: āryaḥ tu eṣa pitā tasya pituḥ tava mahātmanaḥ

original: 01,169.009a sa evam ukto duḥkhārtaḥ satyavāg ṛṣisattamaḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam uktaḥ duḥkha ārtaḥ satya vāc ṛṣi sattamaḥ
sarva loka vināśāya matim cakre mahāmanāḥ
tam tathā niścita ātmānam mahātmānam mahā tapāḥ
ṛṣiḥ brahma vidām śreṣṭhaḥ maitrāvaruṇiḥ antya dhīḥ

original: 01,169.010c vasiṣṭho vārayām āsa hetunā yena tac chṛṇu
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ vārayām āsa hetunā yena tat śṛṇu
vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca

original: 01,169.011a kṛtavīrya iti khyāto babhūva nṛpatiḥ kṣitau
analyzed: kṛtavīryaḥ iti khyātaḥ babhūva nṛpatiḥ kṣitau
yājyaḥ veda vidām loke bhṛgūṇām pārthiva ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 01,169.012a sa tān agrabhujas tāta dhānyena ca dhanena ca
analyzed: sa tān agra bhujaḥ tāta dhānyena ca dhanena ca

original: 01,169.012c somānte tarpayām āsa vipulena viśāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: soma ante tarpayām āsa vipulena viśām patiḥ
tasmin nṛpati śārdūle svaryāte kadā cana
babhūva tad kuleyānām dravya kāryam upasthitam

original: 01,169.014a te bhṛgūṇāṃ dhanaṃ jñātvā rājānaḥ sarva eva ha
analyzed: te bhṛgūṇām dhanam jñātvā rājānaḥ sarve eva ha
yāciṣṇavaḥ bhijagmuḥ tān tāta bhārgava sattamān

original: 01,169.015a bhūmau tu nidadhuḥ ke cid bhṛgavo dhanam akṣayam
analyzed: bhūmau tu nidadhuḥ ke cid bhṛgavaḥ dhanam akṣayam

original: 01,169.015c daduḥ ke cid dvijātibhyo jñātvā kṣatriyato bhayam
analyzed: daduḥ ke cid dvijātibhyaḥ jñātvā kṣatriyataḥ bhayam

original: 01,169.016a bhṛgavas tu daduḥ ke cit teṣāṃ vittaṃ yathepsitam
analyzed: bhṛgavaḥ tu daduḥ ke cid teṣām vittam yathā īpsitam
kṣatriyāṇām tadā tāta kāraṇa antara darśanāt
tatas mahī talam tāta kṣatriyeṇa yadṛcchayā
khanatā adhigatam vittam kena cit bhṛgu veśmani

original: 01,169.017e tad vittaṃ dadṛśuḥ sarve sametāḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: tat vittam dadṛśuḥ sarve sametāḥ kṣatriya ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 01,169.018a avamanya tataḥ kopād bhṛgūṃs tāñ śaraṇāgatān
analyzed: avamanya tatas kopāt bhṛgūn tām śaraṇa āgatān

original: 01,169.018c nijaghnus te maheṣvāsāḥ sarvāṃs tān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: nijaghnuḥ te mahā iṣvāsāḥ sarvān tān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 01,169.018e ā garbhād anukṛntantaś ceruś caiva vasuṃdharām
analyzed: ā garbhāt anukṛntantaḥ ceruḥ ca eva vasuṃdharām

original: 01,169.019a tata ucchidyamāneṣu bhṛguṣv evaṃ bhayāt tadā
analyzed: tatas ucchidyamāneṣu bhṛguṣu evam bhayāt tadā
bhṛgu patnyaḥ girim tāta himavantam prapedire

original: 01,169.020a tāsām anyatamā garbhaṃ bhayād dādhāra taijasam
analyzed: tāsām anyatamā garbham bhayāt dādhāra taijasam
ūruṇā ekena vāma ūrūḥ bhartuḥ kula vivṛddhaye
tad garbham upalabhya āśu brāhmaṇī yā bhaya arditā
gatvā ekā kathayām āsa kṣatriyāṇām upahvare

original: 01,169.020d*1788_03 tatas te kṣatriyā jagmus taṃ garbhaṃ hantum udyatāḥ
analyzed: tatas te kṣatriyāḥ jagmuḥ tam garbham hantum udyatāḥ

original: 01,169.020e dadṛśur brāhmaṇīṃ tāṃ te dīpyamānāṃ svatejasā
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ brāhmaṇīm tām te dīpyamānām sva tejasā

original: 01,169.021a atha garbhaḥ sa bhittvoruṃ brāhmaṇyā nirjagāma ha
analyzed: atha garbhaḥ sa bhittvā ūrum brāhmaṇyāḥ nirjagāma ha

original: 01,169.021c muṣṇan dṛṣṭīḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ madhyāhna iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: muṣṇan dṛṣṭīḥ kṣatriyāṇām madhyāhne iva bhāskaraḥ
tatas cakṣuḥ viyuktāḥ te giri durgeṣu babhramuḥ
tatas te mogha saṃkalpāḥ bhaya ārtāḥ kṣatriya ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 01,169.022c brahmaṇīṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur dṛṣṭyarthaṃ tām aninditām
analyzed: brahmaṇīm śaraṇam jagmuḥ dṛṣṭi artham tām aninditām

original: 01,169.023a ūcuś caināṃ mahābhāgāṃ kṣatriyās te vicetasaḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca enām mahābhāgām kṣatriyāḥ te vicetasaḥ
jyotiḥ prahīṇāḥ duḥkha ārtāḥ śānta arciṣaḥ iva agnayaḥ
bhagavatyāḥ prasādena gacchet kṣatram sa cakṣuṣam
upāramya ca gacchema sahitāḥ pāpa karmaṇaḥ

original: 01,169.025a saputrā tvaṃ prasādaṃ naḥ sarveṣāṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: sa putrā tvam prasādam naḥ sarveṣām kartum arhasi
punar dṛṣṭi pradānena rājñaḥ saṃtrātum arhasi
brāhmaṇī uvāca

original: 01,170.001a nāhaṃ gṛhṇāmi vas tāta dṛṣṭīr nāsti ruṣānvitā
analyzed: na aham gṛhṇāmi vaḥ tāta dṛṣṭīḥ na asti ruṣā anvitā

original: 01,170.001c ayaṃ tu bhārgavo nūnam ūrujaḥ kupito 'dya vaḥ
analyzed: ayam tu bhārgavaḥ nūnam ūru jaḥ kupitaḥ vaḥ

original: 01,170.002a tena cakṣūṃṣi vas tāta nūnaṃ kopān mahātmanā
analyzed: tena cakṣūṃṣi vaḥ tāta nūnam kopāt mahātmanā

original: 01,170.002c smaratā nihatān bandhūn ādattāni na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: smaratā nihatān bandhūn ādattāni na saṃśayaḥ

original: 01,170.003a garbhān api yadā yūyaṃ bhṛgūṇāṃ ghnata putrakāḥ
analyzed: garbhān api yadā yūyam bhṛgūṇām ghnata putrakāḥ

original: 01,170.003c tadāyam ūruṇā garbho mayā varṣaśataṃ dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: tadā ayam ūruṇā garbhaḥ mayā varṣa śatam dhṛtaḥ

original: 01,170.004a ṣaḍaṅgaś cākhilo veda imaṃ garbhastham eva hi
analyzed: ṣaṣ aṅgaḥ ca akhilaḥ vedaḥ imam garbha stham eva hi
viveśa bhṛgu vaṃśasya bhūyas priya cikīrṣayā

original: 01,170.005a so 'yaṃ pitṛvadhān nūnaṃ krodhād vo hantum icchati
analyzed: saḥ yam pitṛ vadhāt nūnam krodhāt vaḥ hantum icchati

original: 01,170.005c tejasā yasya divyena cakṣūṃṣi muṣitāni vaḥ
analyzed: tejasā yasya divyena cakṣūṃṣi muṣitāni vaḥ

original: 01,170.006a tam imaṃ tāta yācadhvam aurvaṃ mama sutottamam
analyzed: tam imam tāta yācadhvam aurvam mama suta uttamam

original: 01,170.006c ayaṃ vaḥ praṇipātena tuṣṭo dṛṣṭīr vimokṣyati
analyzed: ayam vaḥ praṇipātena tuṣṭaḥ dṛṣṭīḥ vimokṣyati
gandharvaḥ uvāca

original: 01,170.007a evam uktās tataḥ sarve rājānas te tam ūrujam
analyzed: evam uktāḥ tatas sarve rājānaḥ te tam ūru jam

original: 01,170.007c ūcuḥ prasīdeti tadā prasādaṃ ca cakāra saḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ prasīda iti tadā prasādam ca cakāra saḥ

original: 01,170.008a anenaiva ca vikhyāto nāmnā lokeṣu sattamaḥ
analyzed: anena eva ca vikhyātaḥ nāmnā lokeṣu sattamaḥ

original: 01,170.008c sa aurva iti viprarṣir ūruṃ bhittvā vyajāyata
analyzed: saḥ aurvaḥ iti viprarṣiḥ ūrum bhittvā vyajāyata
cakṣūṃṣi pratilabhya atha pratijagmuḥ tatas nṛpāḥ
bhārgavaḥ tu muniḥ mene sarva loka parābhavam

original: 01,170.010a sa cakre tāta lokānāṃ vināśāya mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: sa cakre tāta lokānām vināśāya mahāmanāḥ

original: 01,170.010c sarveṣām eva kārtsnyena manaḥ pravaṇam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām eva kārtsnyena manaḥ pravaṇam ātmanaḥ
icchan apacitim kartum bhṛgūṇām bhṛgu sattamaḥ
sarva loka vināśāya tapasā mahatā edhitaḥ
tāpayām āsa lokān sa sa deva asura mānuṣān
tapasā ugreṇa mahatā nandayiṣyan pitāmahān

original: 01,170.013a tatas taṃ pitaras tāta vijñāya bhṛgusattamam
analyzed: tatas tam pitaraḥ tāta vijñāya bhṛgu sattamam

original: 01,170.013c pitṛlokād upāgamya sarva ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: pitṛ lokāt upāgamya sarve ūcuḥ idam vacaḥ

original: 01,170.014a aurva dṛṣṭaḥ prabhāvas te tapasograsya putraka
analyzed: aurva dṛṣṭaḥ prabhāvaḥ te tapasā ugrasya putraka

original: 01,170.014c prasādaṃ kuru lokānāṃ niyaccha krodham ātmanaḥ
analyzed: prasādam kuru lokānām niyaccha krodham ātmanaḥ

original: 01,170.015a nānīśair hi tadā tāta bhṛgubhir bhāvitātmabhiḥ

original: 01,173.013a akṛtārthā hy ahaṃ bhartrā prasavārthaś ca me mahān
analyzed: akṛtārthā hi aham bhartrā prasava arthaḥ ca me mahān
prasīda nṛpati śreṣṭha bhartā me yam visṛjyatām
evam vikrośamānāyāḥ tasyāḥ sa su nṛśaṃsa kṛt

original: 01,173.014c bhartāraṃ bhakṣayām āsa vyāghro mṛgam ivepsitam
analyzed: bhartāram bhakṣayām āsa vyāghraḥ mṛgam iva īpsitam

original: 01,173.015a tasyāḥ krodhābhibhūtāyā yad aśru nyapatad bhuvi
analyzed: tasyāḥ krodha abhibhūtāyāḥ yat aśru nyapatat bhuvi

original: 01,173.015c so 'gniḥ samabhavad dīptas taṃ ca deśaṃ vyadīpayat
analyzed: saḥ agniḥ samabhavat dīptaḥ tam ca deśam vyadīpayat
tatas sā śoka saṃtaptā bhartṛ vyasana duḥkhitā
kalmāṣapādam rājarṣim aśapat brāhmaṇī ruṣā
yasmāt mama akṛtārthāyāḥ tvayā kṣudra nṛśaṃsa vat

original: 01,173.017c prekṣantyā bhakṣito me 'dya prabhur bhartā mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: prekṣantyāḥ bhakṣitaḥ me prabhuḥ bhartā mahā yaśāḥ
tasmāt tvam api durbuddhe mad śāpa parivikṣataḥ

original: 01,173.018c patnīm ṛtāv anuprāpya sadyas tyakṣyasi jīvitam
analyzed: patnīm ṛtau anuprāpya sadyas tyakṣyasi jīvitam

original: 01,173.018d*1799_01 tena prasādyamānā sā prasādam akarot tadā
analyzed: tena prasādyamānā sā prasādam akarot tadā

original: 01,173.019a yasya carṣer vasiṣṭhasya tvayā putrā vināśitāḥ
analyzed: yasya ca ṛṣeḥ vasiṣṭhasya tvayā putrāḥ vināśitāḥ

original: 01,173.019c tena saṃgamya te bhāryā tanayaṃ janayiṣyati
analyzed: tena saṃgamya te bhāryā tanayam janayiṣyati

original: 01,173.019e sa te vaṃśakaraḥ putro bhaviṣyati nṛpādhama
analyzed: sa te vaṃśa karaḥ putraḥ bhaviṣyati nṛpa adhama

original: 01,173.020a evaṃ śaptvā tu rājānaṃ sā tam āṅgirasī śubhā
analyzed: evam śaptvā tu rājānam sā tam āṅgirasī śubhā
tasya eva saṃnidhau dīptam praviveśa hutāśanam

original: 01,173.021a vasiṣṭhaś ca mahābhāgaḥ sarvam etad apaśyata
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ ca mahābhāgaḥ sarvam etat apaśyata
jñāna yogena mahatā tapasā ca paraṃtapa

original: 01,173.021d*1800_01 na cāpy atra mahābāho adharmaḥ pratipadyate
analyzed: na ca api atra mahā bāho adharmaḥ pratipadyate

original: 01,173.021d*1800_02 brāhmaṇo yad apatyaṃ hi prārthitaḥ saṃprayacchati
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ yat apatyam hi prārthitaḥ saṃprayacchati

original: 01,173.021d*1800_03 yadā tu kāmato gacchet paranārīṃ naro nṛpa
analyzed: yadā tu kāmataḥ gacchet para nārīm naraḥ nṛpa
tadā asya para dāra uktam adharmasya phalam bhavet
apakalkaḥ tu rāja indra nistīrya etat dvijottamaḥ

original: 01,173.021d*1800_06 nānyato bharataśreṣṭha sa hi lokagurur yataḥ
analyzed: na anyatas bharata śreṣṭha sa hi loka guruḥ yatas

original: 01,173.022a muktaśāpaś ca rājarṣiḥ kālena mahatā tataḥ
analyzed: mukta śāpaḥ ca rājarṣiḥ kālena mahatā tatas
ṛtu kāle madayantyā nivāritaḥ

original: 01,173.023a na hi sasmāra nṛpatis taṃ śāpaṃ śāpamohitaḥ
analyzed: na hi sasmāra nṛpatiḥ tam śāpam śāpa mohitaḥ

original: 01,173.023c devyāḥ so 'tha vacaḥ śrutvā sa tasyā nṛpasattamaḥ
analyzed: devyāḥ saḥ tha vacaḥ śrutvā sa tasyāḥ nṛpa sattamaḥ

original: 01,173.023e taṃ ca śāpam anusmṛtya paryatapyad bhṛśaṃ tadā
analyzed: tam ca śāpam anusmṛtya paryatapyat bhṛśam tadā
etasmāt kāraṇāt rājā vasiṣṭham saṃnyayojayat
sva dāre bharata śreṣṭha śāpa doṣa samanvitaḥ

original: 01,173.024d*1801_01 yadā kalmāṣapādas tu rākṣasatvam avāpa saḥ
analyzed: yadā kalmāṣapādaḥ tu rākṣasa tvam avāpa saḥ
tadā vasiṣṭhaḥ kuruṇā yajña arthe saṃvṛtaḥ bhavat
yadā kalmāṣapādaḥ tu rākṣasa tvam visṛṣṭavān

original: 01,173.024d*1801_04 tadā tenaiva rājñā tu vasiṣṭhaḥ saṃvṛto 'bhavat
analyzed: tadā tena eva rājñā tu vasiṣṭhaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ bhavat
evam vasiṣṭhaḥ yuṣmākam purodhāḥ saṃvṛtaḥ bhavat
arjunaḥ uvāca

original: 01,174.001a asmākam anurūpo vai yaḥ syād gandharva vedavit
analyzed: asmākam anurūpaḥ vai yaḥ syāt gandharva veda vid

original: 01,174.001c purohitas tam ācakṣva sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava
analyzed: purohitaḥ tam ācakṣva sarvam hi viditam tava
gandharvaḥ uvāca
yavīyān devalasya eṣa vane bhrātā tapasyati

original: 01,174.002c dhaumya utkocake tīrthe taṃ vṛṇudhvaṃ yadīcchatha
analyzed: dhaumyaḥ utkocake tīrthe tam vṛṇudhvam yadi icchatha
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
tatas rjunaḥ stram āgneyam pradadau tat yathāvidhi

original: 01,174.003c gandharvāya tadā prīto vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: gandharvāya tadā prītaḥ vacanam ca idam abravīt

original: 01,174.004a tvayy eva tāvat tiṣṭhantu hayā gandharvasattama
analyzed: tvayi eva tāvat tiṣṭhantu hayāḥ gandharva sattama

original: 01,174.004c karmakāle grahīṣyāmi svasti te 'stv iti cābravīt
analyzed: karma kāle grahīṣyāmi svasti te stu iti ca abravīt

original: 01,174.005a te 'nyonyam abhisaṃpūjya gandharvaḥ pāṇḍavāś ca ha
analyzed: te nyonyam abhisaṃpūjya gandharvaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ ca ha
ramyāt bhāgīrathī kacchāt yathākāmam pratasthire

original: 01,174.006a tata utkocakaṃ tīrthaṃ gatvā dhaumyāśramaṃ tu te
analyzed: tatas utkocakam tīrtham gatvā dhaumya āśramam tu te

original: 01,174.006c taṃ vavruḥ pāṇḍavā dhaumyaṃ paurohityāya bhārata
analyzed: tam vavruḥ pāṇḍavāḥ dhaumyam paurohityāya bhārata
tān dhaumyaḥ pratijagrāha sarva veda vidām varaḥ
pādyena phala mūlena paurohityena ca eva ha

original: 01,174.008a te tadāśaṃsire labdhāṃ śriyaṃ rājyaṃ ca pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: te tadā āśaṃsire labdhām śriyam rājyam ca pāṇḍavāḥ

original: 01,174.008c taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ puraskṛtya pāñcālyāś ca svayaṃvaram
analyzed: tam brāhmaṇam puraskṛtya pāñcālyāḥ ca svayaṃvaram

original: 01,174.009a mātṛṣaṣṭhās tu te tena guruṇā saṃgatās tadā
analyzed: mātṛ ṣaṣṭhāḥ tu te tena guruṇā saṃgatāḥ tadā
nāthavantam iva ātmānam menire bharata ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 01,174.010a sa hi vedārthatattvajñas teṣāṃ gurur udāradhīḥ
analyzed: sa hi veda artha tattva jñaḥ teṣām guruḥ udāra dhīḥ

original: 01,174.010c tena dharmavidā pārthā yājyāḥ sarvavidā kṛtāḥ
analyzed: tena dharma vidā pārthāḥ yājyāḥ sarva vidā kṛtāḥ

original: 01,174.011a vīrāṃs tu sa hi tān mene prāptarājyān svadharmataḥ
analyzed: vīrān tu sa hi tān mene prāpta rājyān svadharmataḥ
buddhi vīrya bala utsāhaiḥ yuktān devān iva aparān
kṛta svastyayanāḥ tena tatas te manuja adhipāḥ

original: 01,174.012c menire sahitā gantuṃ pāñcālyās taṃ svayaṃvaram
analyzed: menire sahitāḥ gantum pāñcālyāḥ tam svayaṃvaram

original: 01,174.014b*1802_01 vedavic caiva vāgmī ca dhaumyaḥ śrīmān dvijottamaḥ
analyzed: veda vid ca eva vāgmī ca dhaumyaḥ śrīmān dvijottamaḥ

original: 01,174.014b*1802_02 tejasā caiva buddhyā ca rūpeṇa yaśasā śriyā
analyzed: tejasā ca eva buddhyā ca rūpeṇa yaśasā śriyā

original: 01,174.014b*1802_03 mantraiś ca vividhair dhaumyas tulya āsīd bṛhaspateḥ
analyzed: mantraiḥ ca vividhaiḥ dhaumyaḥ tulyaḥ āsīt bṛhaspateḥ

original: 01,174.014b*1802_04 sa cāpi vipras tān mene svabhāvābhyadhikān bhuvi
analyzed: sa ca api vipraḥ tān mene svabhāva abhyadhikān bhuvi
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,175.001a tatas te naraśārdūlā bhrātaraḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: tatas te nara śārdūlāḥ bhrātaraḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
brahma rūpa dharāḥ pārthāḥ jaṭilāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: 01,175.001c prayayur draupadīṃ draṣṭuṃ taṃ ca devamahotsavam
analyzed: prayayuḥ draupadīm draṣṭum tam ca deva mahā utsavam

original: 01,175.002a te prayātā naravyāghrā mātrā saha paraṃtapāḥ
analyzed: te prayātāḥ nara vyāghrāḥ mātrā saha paraṃtapāḥ

original: 01,175.002c brāhmaṇān dadṛśur mārge gacchataḥ sagaṇān bahūn
analyzed: brāhmaṇān dadṛśuḥ mārge gacchataḥ sa gaṇān bahūn

original: 01,175.003a tān ūcur brāhmaṇā rājan pāṇḍavān brahmacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: tān ūcuḥ brāhmaṇāḥ rājan pāṇḍavān brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: 01,175.003c kva bhavanto gamiṣyanti kuto vāgacchateti ha
analyzed: kva bhavantaḥ gamiṣyanti kutas vā agacchata iti ha
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca
āgatān ekacakrāyāḥ sodaryān devadarśinaḥ
bhavantaḥ hi vijānantu sahitān mātṛ cāriṇaḥ
brāhmaṇāḥ ūcuḥ
gacchata adya eva pāñcālān drupadasya niveśanam
svayaṃvaraḥ mahān tatra bhavitā su mahādhanaḥ

original: 01,175.006a ekasārthaṃ prayātāḥ smo vayam apy atra gāminaḥ
analyzed: eka sārtham prayātāḥ smaḥ vayam api atra gāminaḥ
tatra hi adbhuta saṃkāśaḥ bhavitā su mahā utsavaḥ
yajñasenasya duhitā drupadasya mahātmanaḥ
vedī madhyāt samutpannā padma patra nibha īkṣaṇā
dhṛṣṭadyumnasya bhaginī droṇa śatroḥ pratāpinaḥ

original: 01,175.009a yo jātaḥ kavacī khaḍgī saśaraḥ saśarāsanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ jātaḥ kavacī khaḍgī sa śaraḥ sa śarāsanaḥ
su samiddhe mahā bāhuḥ pāvake pāvaka prabhaḥ
yasmin saṃjāyamāne ca vāc uvāca aśarīriṇī

original: 01,175.009d*1804_02 eṣa śiṣyaś ca mṛtyuś ca bharadvājasya jāyate
analyzed: eṣa śiṣyaḥ ca mṛtyuḥ ca bharadvājasya jāyate
svasā tasya anavadya aṅgī draupadī tanu madhyamā
nīlotpala samaḥ gandhaḥ yasyāḥ krośāt pravāyati
tām yajñasenasya sutām svayaṃvara kṛta kṣaṇām

original: 01,175.011c gacchāmahe vayaṃ draṣṭuṃ taṃ ca devamahotsavam
analyzed: gacchāmahe vayam draṣṭum tam ca deva mahā utsavam
rājānaḥ rāja putrāḥ ca yajvānaḥ bhūri dakṣiṇāḥ
svādhyāyavantaḥ śucayaḥ mahātmānaḥ yata vratāḥ
taruṇāḥ darśanīyāḥ ca nānā deśa samāgatāḥ
mahā rathāḥ kṛtāstrāḥ ca samupaiṣyanti bhūmipāḥ

original: 01,175.014a te tatra vividhān dāyān vijayārthaṃ nareśvarāḥ
analyzed: te tatra vividhān dāyān vijaya artham nareśvarāḥ

original: 01,175.014c pradāsyanti dhanaṃ gāś ca bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: pradāsyanti dhanam gāḥ ca bhakṣyam bhojyam ca sarvaśas

original: 01,175.015a pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā caiva svayaṃvaram
analyzed: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvam dṛṣṭvā ca eva svayaṃvaram
anubhūya utsavam ca eva gamiṣyāmaḥ yathā īpsitam
naṭāḥ vaitālikāḥ ca eva nartakāḥ sūta māgadhāḥ
niyodhakāḥ ca deśebhyaḥ sameṣyanti mahā balāḥ

original: 01,175.017a evaṃ kautūhalaṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭvā ca pratigṛhya ca
analyzed: evam kautūhalam kṛtvā dṛṣṭvā ca pratigṛhya ca
saha asmābhiḥ mahātmānaḥ punar pratinivartsyatha

original: 01,175.018a darśanīyāṃś ca vaḥ sarvān devarūpān avasthitān
analyzed: darśanīyān ca vaḥ sarvān deva rūpān avasthitān
samīkṣya kṛṣṇā varayet saṃgatya anyatamam varam

original: 01,175.019a ayaṃ bhrātā tava śrīmān darśanīyo mahābhujaḥ
analyzed: ayam bhrātā tava śrīmān darśanīyaḥ mahā bhujaḥ
niyudhyamānaḥ vijayet saṃgatyā draviṇam bahu

original: 01,175.019d*1805_01 āhariṣyann ayaṃ nūnaṃ prītiṃ vo vardhayiṣyati
analyzed: āhariṣyan ayam nūnam prītim vaḥ vardhayiṣyati
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca
paramam bho gamiṣyāmaḥ draṣṭum deva mahā utsavam

original: 01,175.020c bhavadbhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve kanyāyās taṃ svayaṃvaram
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve kanyāyāḥ tam svayaṃvaram
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,176.001a evam uktāḥ prayātās te pāṇḍavā janamejaya
analyzed: evam uktāḥ prayātāḥ te pāṇḍavāḥ janamejaya
rājñā dakṣiṇa pāñcālān drupadena abhirakṣitān

original: 01,176.002a tatas te taṃ mahātmānaṃ śuddhātmānam akalmaṣam
analyzed: tatas te tam mahātmānam śuddha ātmānam akalmaṣam

original: 01,176.002c dadṛśuḥ pāṇḍavā rājan pathi dvaipāyanaṃ tadā
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ rājan pathi dvaipāyanam tadā

original: 01,176.003a tasmai yathāvat satkāraṃ kṛtvā tena ca sāntvitāḥ
analyzed: tasmai yathāvat satkāram kṛtvā tena ca sāntvitāḥ
kathā ante ca abhyanujñātāḥ prayayuḥ drupada kṣayam

original: 01,176.004a paśyanto ramaṇīyāni vanāni ca sarāṃsi ca
analyzed: paśyantaḥ ramaṇīyāni vanāni ca sarāṃsi ca

original: 01,176.004c tatra tatra vasantaś ca śanair jagmur mahārathāḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra vasantaḥ ca śanais jagmuḥ mahā rathāḥ
svādhyāyavantaḥ śucayaḥ madhurāḥ priya vādinaḥ
ānupūrvyeṇa saṃprāptāḥ pāñcālān kuru nandanāḥ

original: 01,176.006a te tu dṛṣṭvā puraṃ tac ca skandhāvāraṃ ca pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: te tu dṛṣṭvā puram tat ca skandhāvāram ca pāṇḍavāḥ
kumbhakārasya śālāyām niveśam cakrire tadā

original: 01,176.007a tatra bhaikṣaṃ samājahrur brāhmīṃ vṛttiṃ samāśritāḥ
analyzed: tatra bhaikṣam samājahruḥ brāhmīm vṛttim samāśritāḥ

original: 01,176.007c tāṃś ca prāptāṃs tadā vīrāñ jajñire na narāḥ kva cit
analyzed: tān ca prāptān tadā jajñire na narāḥ kva cit
yajñasenaḥ tu pāñcālaḥ bhīṣma droṇa kṛta āgasam
jñātvā ātmānam tadā ārebhe trāṇāya ātma kriyām kṣamām

original: 01,176.007d*1806_03 avāpya dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ hi na sa droṇam acintayat
analyzed: avāpya dhṛṣṭadyumnam hi na sa droṇam acintayat
suta vaira prasaṅgāt ca bhīṣmāt bhayam acintayat
kanyā dānāt tu śaraṇam saḥ manyata mahīpatiḥ
jāmātuḥ bala saṃyogāt mene ha balavattaram
yajñasenasya kāmaḥ tu pāṇḍavāya kirīṭine

original: 01,176.008c kṛṣṇāṃ dadyām iti sadā na caitad vivṛṇoti saḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇām dadyām iti sadā na ca etat vivṛṇoti saḥ
saḥ nu eṣamāṇaḥ kaunteyān pāñcālyaḥ janamejaya

original: 01,176.009b*1808_01 śaṃkareṇa varo dattaḥ prītena ca mahātmanā
analyzed: śaṃkareṇa varaḥ dattaḥ prītena ca mahātmanā

original: 01,176.009b*1808_02 sa niṣphalaḥ syān na tu me iti prāmāṇyam āgataḥ
analyzed: sa niṣphalaḥ syāt na tu me iti prāmāṇyam āgataḥ
mayā kartavyam adhunā duṣkaram lakṣya vedhanam

original: 01,176.009b*1808_04 iti niścitya manasā kāritaṃ lakṣyam uttamam
analyzed: iti niścitya manasā kāritam lakṣyam uttamam

original: 01,176.009c dṛḍhaṃ dhanur anāyamyaṃ kārayām āsa bhārata
analyzed: dṛḍham dhanuḥ anāyamyam kārayām āsa bhārata
vaiyyāghrapadya sā ugram vai sṛñjayasya mahīpateḥ

original: 01,176.009d*1809_02 tad dhanuḥ kiṃdhuraṃ nāma devadattam upānayat
analyzed: tat dhanuḥ kiṃdhuram nāma devadattam upānayat

original: 01,176.009d*1809_03 āyasī tasya jyā cāsīt pratibaddhā mahābalā
analyzed: āyasī tasya jyā ca āsīt pratibaddhā mahā balā

original: 01,176.009d*1809_04 na tu jyāṃ prasahed anyāṃ tad dhanuḥpravaraṃ mahat
analyzed: na tu jyām prasahet anyām tat dhanuḥ pravaram mahat

original: 01,176.010a yantraṃ vaihāyasaṃ cāpi kārayām āsa kṛtrimam
analyzed: yantram vaihāyasam ca api kārayām āsa kṛtrimam

original: 01,176.010c tena yantreṇa sahitaṃ rājā lakṣyaṃ ca kāñcanam
analyzed: tena yantreṇa sahitam rājā lakṣyam ca kāñcanam
drupadaḥ uvāca

original: 01,176.011a idaṃ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā sajyenānena sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: idam sajyam dhanuḥ kṛtvā sajyena anena sāyakaiḥ

original: 01,176.011c atītya lakṣyaṃ yo veddhā sa labdhā matsutām iti
analyzed: atītya lakṣyam yaḥ veddhā sa labdhā mad sutām iti
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 01,176.012a iti sa drupado rājā sarvataḥ samaghoṣayat
analyzed: iti sa drupadaḥ rājā sarvatas samaghoṣayat

original: 01,176.012c tac chrutvā pārthivāḥ sarve samīyus tatra bhārata
analyzed: tat śrutvā pārthivāḥ sarve samīyuḥ tatra bhārata
ṛṣayaḥ ca mahātmānaḥ svayaṃvara didṛkṣayā
yādavāḥ vāsudevena sārdham andhaka vṛṣṇayaḥ
rājānaḥ rāja putrāḥ ca yuvānaḥ mṛṣṭa kuṇḍalāḥ

analyzed: tatas jiṣṇuḥ sahasrākṣam kham vitatya iṣubhiḥ śitaiḥ

original: 01,218.013d*2125_01 subhadrajavam ādīptaṃ tadā vāyuṃ visarja ha

śani mucaḥ ghorān taḍit stanita niḥsvanān

original: 01,218.016c jaladhārāś ca tāḥ śoṣaṃ jagmur neśuś ca vidyutaḥ
analyzed: jala dhārāḥ ca tāḥ śoṣam jagmuḥ neśuḥ ca vidyutaḥ

sicyamānaḥ vasā oghaiḥ taiḥ prāṇinām deha niḥsṛtaiḥ

original: 01,218.019a kṛṣṇābhyāṃ rakṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca dāvam ahaṃkṛtāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇābhyām rakṣitam dṛṣṭvā tam ca dāvam ahaṃkṛtāḥ

garuḍāḥ vajra sadṛśaiḥ pakṣa tuṇḍa nakhaiḥ tathā
prahartu kāmāḥ saṃpetuḥ ākāśāt kṛṣṇa pāṇḍavau

utsṛjantaḥ viṣam ghoram niśceruḥ jvalita ānanāḥ

original: 01,218.022a tāṃś cakarta śaraiḥ pārthaḥ saroṣān dṛśya khecarān
analyzed: tān cakarta śaraiḥ pārthaḥ sa roṣān dṛśya khecarān

utpetuḥ nādam atulam utsṛjantaḥ raṇa arthiṇaḥ
ayaḥkaṇapa cakrāśma bhuśuṇḍi udyata bāhavaḥ
kṛṣṇa pārthau jighāṃsantaḥ krodha saṃmūrcchita ojasaḥ
teṣām abhivyāharatām śastra varṣam ca muñcatām
pramamātha uttamāṅgāni bībhatsuḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ ca su mahā tejāḥ cakreṇa ari nihā tadā

atha apare śaraiḥ viddhāḥ cakra vega īritāḥ tadā
velām iva samāsādya vyātiṣṭhanta mahā ojasaḥ

original: 01,218.028c pāṇḍuraṃ gajam āsthāya tāv ubhau samabhidravat

original: 01,218.029a aśaniṃ gṛhya tarasā vajram astram avāsṛjat
analyzed: aśanim gṛhya tarasā vajram astram avāsṛjat

original: 01,218.029c hatāv etāv iti prāha surān asurasūdanaḥ
analyzed: hatau etau iti prāha surān asurasūdanaḥ

original: 01,218.030c jagṛhuḥ sarvaśastrāṇi svāni svāni surās tadā

original: 01,218.031a kāladaṇḍaṃ yamo rājā śibikāṃ ca dhaneśvaraḥ

original: 01,218.031c pāśaṃ ca varuṇas tatra vicakraṃ ca tathā śivaḥ

original: 01,218.031d*2130_01 skandaḥ śaktiṃ samādāya tasthau merur ivācalaḥ

analyzed: śaktim khaḍgam yātu rājaḥ samīraḥ uṅkuśam eva ca

original: 01,218.032c jagṛhe ca dhanur dhātā musalaṃ ca jayas tathā
analyzed: jagṛhe ca dhanuḥ dhātā musalam ca jayaḥ tathā

original: 01,218.033a parvataṃ cāpi jagrāha kruddhas tvaṣṭā mahābalaḥ
analyzed: parvatam ca api jagrāha kruddhaḥ tvaṣṭā mahā balaḥ

original: 01,218.033c aṃśas tu śaktiṃ jagrāha mṛtyur devaḥ paraśvadham
analyzed: aṃśaḥ tu śaktim jagrāha mṛtyuḥ devaḥ paraśvadham

original: 01,218.034c mitraś ca kṣuraparyantaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya vyatiṣṭhata

original: 01,218.035a pūṣā bhagaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ savitā ca viśāṃ pate

analyzed: rudrāḥ ca vasavaḥ ca eva marutaḥ ca mahā balāḥ

analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ devāḥ tau puruṣa uttamau

original: 01,218.045a viphalaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ tat saṃprekṣya ca śatakratuḥ

original: 01,219.024a na ca sma kiṃ cic chaknoti bhūtaṃ niścarituṃ tataḥ

original: 01,219.032a sa māṃsarudhiraughaiś ca medaughaiś ca samīritaḥ
